ColonySettler43.title: 정착민
ColonySettler43.desc:
NAME(은)는 새로운 세계의 정착민입니다.
이런 인생을 살려면 모든 기본적인 기술에 익숙해야 합니다.

MedievalFarmOaf58.title: 중세 농부
MedievalFarmOaf58.desc:
개간, 괭이질, 소 끌기, 손수레 밀기. 도랑 파기, 씨앗 심기, 수확 예측.
중세 농부들은 밭일에 대해서는 상당한 전문가이지만 일반적인 교육은 하나도 받지 못했습니다. 따라서 지적이고 기술 주도적인 활동을 전혀 할 수 없습니다.

MedievalLord20.title: 중세 영주
MedievalLord20.desc:
NAME(은)는 산업화 이전 행성의 영주로써 연회에 참석하고, 부하를 부리기도 하고, 약간의 무예도 익혔습니다.
HIS 여린 손은 평생 작업 도구를 잡아본 적이 없고 육체노동을 격 떨어지는 일로 여깁니다.

UrbworldEntrepreneur55.title: 도시계 기업가
UrbworldEntrepreneur55.desc:
도시계에선 대부분이 고통받습니다. 그러나 누군가는 기업을 이끌어야 했습니다.
NAME(은)는 기술을 분석하거나 뇌물을 먹이는 등의 사업 기술을 배웠습니다. HE 사회 지능적 기계 같은 인간입니다.

DeepSpaceMiner11.title: 심우주 광부
DeepSpaceMiner11.desc: NAME(은)는 심우주 굴착기를 타고 소행성에서 금속을 캐내는 고된 일을 했습니다. HE 매일 수동으로 조작하는 산업 기술을 사용했고, 술집에서의 난투 실력도 나쁘지 않았습니다.

NavyScientist96.title: 해군 과학자
NavyScientist96.desc:
성간 전투는 기술로 승리하므로, 제국 해군은 항상 현대 기술의 정점에 서있습니다. 게다가, 우주에서 찾을 수 있는 초월계 유물을 제일 먼저 손에 넣을 수도 있습니다.
NAME(은)는 해군 연구소에서 일했습니다.

MilitaryCommissar49.title: 군대 정치장교
MilitaryCommissar49.desc: NAME(은)는 제국군 대대의 내부 첩보원장이었습니다. HE 부하를 충성을 다 하고, 명령 없이 후퇴하지 않도록 만들었습니다. 이런 일들로 HIS 평판이 안 좋았지만, 아주 미세한 반항의 기미라도 찾아내는 데 큰 도움이 됐습니다.

SpacePirate69.title: 우주 해적
SpacePirate69.desc: 정부가 약하고 사회기반이 얕은 곳에는 해적질이 득세하기 마련입니다. NAME(은)는 그러한 인간 존재 일부였고, 이익을 위해 평화로운 상선을 강탈하고 박살냈습니다.

PitBrawler20.title: 투기장 싸움꾼
PitBrawler20.desc: NAME(이)가 첫 싸움을 했을 때 9살이었습니다. HE 승리했지만, 관중들의 즐거움이 더 중요했습니다. 생존할 수만 있다면 투기장은 꽤 넉넉한 벌이의 직업이었습니다. 심지어 대부분 합법이었습니다.

IllegalShipwright28.title: 불법 조선공
IllegalShipwright28.desc: 테라와트 수준의 감마 레이저 출력기를 화물 평저선에 장착하지 못 하게 하는 법이 있습니다. 특히 매복 가능성을 높이려고 통신 안테나처럼 보이는 곳에 숨기면 더욱 그렇습니다. 그러나 NAME(은)는 법에 별로 흥미 없는 손님들에게서 짭짤한 돈을 받을 수 있다는 걸 알아냈습니다.

Courtesean56.title: 매춘부
Courtesean56.desc: NAME(은)는 여러 행성의 사창가에서 수백 명의 손님에게 몸을 바쳤습니다. HE 마음의 상처와 거리에서 살아남는 지혜를 얻었습니다.

SpaceMarine10.title: 우주 해병
SpaceMarine10.desc: NAME(은)는 제국 해군의 전사였습니다. HIS 임무는 적 함선에 구멍을 뚫고, 승무원들을 쏴죽인 후 그 함선을 나포하는 것입니다. HE 뛰어났습니다.

Assassin35.title: 암살자
Assassin35.desc: NAME(은)는 전문 암살자였습니다. HE 차갑고 계산적이며 수입도 많았습니다. 이 사업에서, 공감 능력에 완전한 결핍이 강점이었습니다.

MedievalSlave75.title: 중세 노예
MedievalSlave75.desc: NAME(은)는 중세계에서 수레를 끌고 땅을 파며 자랐습니다. 단순한 육체노동과 주인의 채찍이 HIS 가장 오랜 친구입니다. HE 9살 전까지 읽는 법을 몰랐습니다.

MedievalLordling62.title: 중세 지주
MedievalLordling62.desc: NAME(은)는 중세계 오래된 왕국의 하급 귀족이었습니다. HE 돌로 된 저택에서 하인들의 시중을 받으며 자랐습니다. 이런 삶으로 어떤 전문적인 기술도 배울 수 없었고, 평생 육체노동에 대한 혐오감을 심어줬습니다. 그러나 NAME(은)는 사람들을 조종하는 법은 일찍 익힐 수 있었습니다.

UrbworldUrchin46.title: 도시계 부랑아
UrbworldUrchin46.desc: 도시계는 인간과 독극물이 넘치는 오래되고 극심한 산업 도시입니다. NAME(은)는 접근을 꺼리는 어두운 곳에서 자랐습니다. HE 한 조각의 음식마다 투쟁해야 했습니다.

VatgrownSoldier83.title: 인공배양 군인
VatgrownSoldier83.desc: NAME(은)는 사람이 아닌 파괴의 도구로 만들어졌습니다. 생체무기 시설에서 자라고 가속 성장 도중 전투 훈련받은, NAME(은)는 여전히 전투적인 성향을 띄고 사람과의 접촉에 혐오합니다.

Hermit87.title: 은둔자
Hermit87.desc: 사회적 상호 작용의 압박을 견딜 수 없던 NAME(은)는 복잡한 중간계 도시를 떠나 야생의 간단한 삶을 살았습니다. 그곳에서 HE 홀로 지내며 밭과 정원을 가꾸고 생존에 필요한 간단한 도구를 만들었습니다.

MidworldChef39.title: 중간계 주방장
MidworldChef39.desc: NAME(은)는 중간계에서 고급 레스토랑을 운영했습니다. HE 단골들 사이에서 창조적인 요리로 유명했고, 직원들 사이에서 잡일에 대한 업신여김으로 악명높았습니다.

SicklyChild40.title: 병약한 아이
SicklyChild40.desc: 어린 시절, NAME(은)는 희소한 질병으로 고생했습니다. 연구 병동에 격리된 HE 최소한의 사람과의 접촉이 있었고 신체적 운동도 거의 하지 못했습니다. 그러나 무균의 병원 환경에서 HE 과학과 의학에 매우 친숙해졌습니다.

MedievalMinstrel69.title: 중세 음악가
MedievalMinstrel69.desc:
NAME(은)는 중세계의 방랑 연예인이였습니다.
HE 이야기를 하거나 노래를 부를 때는 언제나 찾을 수 있었고, 길에서 만날 위협에서 자신을 보호할 수 있었습니다. 그러나 HE 힘든 육체노동을 해야 할 때는 언제나 이상하게 찾기 힘들었습니다.

Housemate5.title: 가정주부
Housemate5.desc: 어른으로서, NAME(은)는 HIS 배우자가 일하는 동안 집을 지키고 아이들을 보살폈습니다.

GlitterworldEmpath39.title: 번화계 공감능력자
GlitterworldEmpath39.desc: NAME(은)는 타인을 이해하고 충돌을 해소하는데 엄청난 재주를 지녔습니다. HE 공감능력자로 선택되어 훈련을 받았습니다. 훈련으로 HIS 자연적인 능력은 극대화됐고 HE 다른 이들을 해칠 수 없게 됐습니다.

ShelterChild65.title: 대피소 아이
ShelterChild65.desc: NAME(은)는 독성계 지하의 대피소에서 자랐습니다. HE 종합교육을 받았지만, 육체노동을 할 기회는 없었습니다.

MedievalDoctor6.title: 중세 의사
MedievalDoctor6.desc:
NAME(은)는 중세 행성에서 의사로 활동했습니다. HE 피를 약간 흘리면 대부분 질병을 치료할 수 있다고 굳게 믿었습니다.
또한, HE 머리를 강하게 내려치는 독창적인 기술을 개발한 마취 장인이었습니다.

Inventor42.title: 발명가
Inventor42.desc: HIS 고향에서, NAME(은)는 어느 정도 성공한 발명가의 삶을 살았습니다. HE 몇 개의 소소한 기술을 발명했습니다.

Teacher24.title: 교사
Teacher24.desc: NAME(은)는 교양 교육을 받았고 공립학교에서 가르쳤습니다. HE 넓은 지식을 가졌고 HIS 학생들에게 인기있었습니다.

IndustrialOrphan55.title: 산업계 고아
IndustrialOrphan55.desc:
NAME(은)는 HIS 부모를 몰랐습니다. HIS 가장 오래된 기억은 산업계 광산과 노역장에서의 고된 일입니다.
당연하게도 HE 적절한 교육을 받지 못했습니다.

Scout67.title: 정찰병
Scout67.desc:
작은 제국령 식민지 행정관에게서 태어난 NAME(은)는 군사 정찰 기술을 배우는 청소년 프로그램에 등록됐습니다.
HE 야생에서 생존하는 법, 복종하는 법, 질문하지 않는 법을 배웠습니다.

JoywireArtist62.title: 쾌락회로 예술가
JoywireArtist62.desc:
NAME(은)는 사용자의 쾌락을 극대화하기 위한 최첨단 쾌락회로 소프트웨어를 개발하는 도시계 연구소에서 일했습니다.
지역 정부가 쾌락회로 생산에 강한 규제를 걸자 HE 제품을 암시장에 팔기 시작했습니다.

FrightenedChild6.title: 겁먹은 아이
FrightenedChild6.desc:
NAME(은)는 수없이 많은 공포증과 노이로제와 함께 자랐습니다. HE 여러 가지 중에 의사와 식품으로 전파되는 병원균을 두려워했습니다.
결과적으로, HE 스스로 요리하고 보살피는 법을 배웠지만, 성인이 돼서도 공포가 HIM 괴롭힙니다.

ConceptualArtist7.title: 개념 예술가
ConceptualArtist7.desc:
NAME(은)는 독특하고 창조적인 개념 예술품으로 고향 예술계에서 유명했습니다.
아무도 HECAP가 뭘 말하려 하는지 몰랐지만, HIS 작품은 수집가들 사이에서 높은 평가를 받았습니다.

GlitterworldSurgeon7.title: 번화계 외과의
GlitterworldSurgeon7.desc:
NAME(은)는 대부분 질병과 고통이 사라진 번화계 외과의였습니다.
HIS 일은 대부분 정교하고 창의적인 성형수술이었습니다. HE 인간 생물학에 대한 이해가 뛰어났지만, 암이나 총알을 제거하지 않아도 됐습니다.

LudditeRebel42.title: 러다이트 반군
LudditeRebel42.desc: HIS 고향 주민 대부분이 각자의 개성과 생물학적 인간성을 포기하고 온라인 집단 지성체로서 결합하기로 하자, NAME(은)는 대부분 기술을 저버린 반군 세력에 합류했습니다.

Bartender47.title: 바텐더
Bartender47.desc: NAME(은)는 더러운 우주 정거장에서 바텐더로 일했습니다. 업무의 일부는 음료를 섞는 일이었고, 일부분은 외교, 그리고 나머지는 손님의 머리를 내려치는 것이었습니다.

CaveworldTender5.title: 동굴계 파수꾼
CaveworldTender5.desc: NAME(은)는 사람이 지내기 힘든 행성 표면 아래 깊은 곳의 동굴망에서 자랐습니다. HE 부족의 버섯을 관리하는 다른 아이들과 함께 일했습니다.

CaveworldTunneler74.title: 동굴계 땅굴쟁이
CaveworldTunneler74.desc:
NAME(은)는 거대한 지하 동굴망에서 땅굴군으로 일했습니다.
HE 바위를 너무 잘 알아서 냄새만으로도 길을 찾을 지경이었습니다.

HiveworldDrone29.title: 군락계 일꾼
HiveworldDrone29.desc: NAME(은)는 거대한 군락계 문명에서의 인격 없는 건설 일꾼이었습니다. 문명 전체를 상대로 한 잔혹한 사회적 실험에서 벗어난 이후로도 HE 창의적인 생각이나 리더십 발휘가 불가능합니다.

Evangelist66.title: 전도사
Evangelist66.desc: NAME(은)는 21번째 생일날 종교적 각성을 체험했고, 여생을 창조주의 말씀, 그분 문화의 아름다움, 그 특별한 치유법을 전파하리라 마음먹었습니다.

TunnelworldIlluminator50.title: 동굴계 인도자
TunnelworldIlluminator50.desc: 동굴 부족민들은 NAME처럼 뛰어난 시력을 가진 사람을 현자라고 칭하며 존경합니다. HE 어둠 속에서 길을 이끌고, 발광 버섯으로 땅을 팔 곳을 표시하며 다른 이들에게 위험요소를 알려줍니다.

Herbalist89.title: 약초 재배자
Herbalist89.desc: NAME(은)는 마을 근처의 숲에 살았습니다. 비록 많은 마을 사람들이 HIM 무서워했지만, 병에 걸린 마을 사람들은 HIM 방문해서 HIS 정원에서 재배된 허브들로 만들어진 연고와 습포제를 사곤 했습니다. HE 많은 돈을 벌기 위해서지만 그들을 도울 수 있어서 기뻤습니다.

ComaChild18.title: 혼수상태의 아이
ComaChild18.desc: 어릴 적 발생한 사고가 NAME(을)를 혼수상태에 빠지게 했습니다. HE 10대 시절이 거의 끝날 때까지 깨어나지 못했습니다. HIS 신체는 오랫동안 활동하지 않아서 회복되지 못했지만, 사람들은 HIS 이야기를 듣게 되면 HIM 가엾게 여깁니다.

CivilServant75.title: 공무원
CivilServant75.desc: NAME(은)는 거의 망해가는 관료제 정부의 하급 관리자로 일했습니다. HE 집에서 복잡한 서류를 작성하는 것과 사내 정치에 뛰어났습니다.

OrganFarm9.title: 장기 농장
OrganFarm9.desc: NAME(은)는 불법적인 지하 장기 농장에서 자랐습니다. HIS 몸은 다친 용병들에게 이식하기 위한 유기물을 성장시키는 데 사용됐습니다. 비록 HIS 양육 과정이 HIM 겁에 질리게 내버려 두는 것뿐이긴 했지만, HECAP가 인간생물학에 대해 특별한 지식을 가질 수 있도록 했습니다.

AsceticPriest87.title: 금욕적인 사제
AsceticPriest87.desc: 침묵을 맹세하고 나서, NAME(은)는 남은 생애를 조용히 명상하며 보내기 위해 후미진 행성의 수도원에 들어갔습니다. HE 정원에서 채소를 기르고, 수도원의 지하 저장고에서 치즈를 만드는 데서 행복을 느꼈습니다.

EscapedConvict68.title: 탈출한 죄수
EscapedConvict68.desc: NAME(은)는 어떤 범죄 때문에 잔혹한 형벌이 행해지는 식민지에 보내지게 됐습니다. HE 그 범죄에 대해 결백을 주장했지만, 소용없었습니다. HE 직접 손본 날붙이를 이용해 아래에 구멍을 파서 탈출했습니다.

StarshipJanitor15.title: 우주선 관리인
StarshipJanitor15.desc: 다른 여행객들이 동면관 안에서 오랜 기간 잠든 상태로 우주를 항해하는 동안, NAME(은)는 우주선을 점검하고, 운항 시스템을 확인하고, 메카노이드에 윤활유를 치기 위해 주기적으로 깨어나야 했습니다.

Pyromaniac68.title: 방화광
Pyromaniac68.desc: 어린 시절부터, NAME(은)는 불에 비정상적으로 끌렸습니다. HE 쓰레기더미에 불을 지르고 멍하니 불꽃을 바라보며 빠져들곤 했습니다. 하루는, 성냥을 가지고 돌다가 실수로 HIS 집을 태워버리기도 했습니다.

Mute55.title: 벙어리
Mute55.desc: NAME(은)는 어릴 적에 겪은 일로 인해 큰 트라우마가 생겼습니다. 그 이후로 HE 다른 사람들에게 말을 하지 않았고, 대신에 집에 있는 여러 애완동물과 노는 것을 좋아했습니다.

WarRefugee70.title: 전쟁 난민
WarRefugee70.desc: HECAP가 아직 아기일 때, NAME(이)가 사는 나라에 전쟁이 일어났습니다. HIS 부모님은 HECAP와 함께 안전한 곳을 찾으러 떠났습니다. NAME의 가장 오래된 기억은 HECAP 자신을 어떻게 지킬 수 있는지 배웠던 것입니다. HECAP가 목격한 폭력과 파괴는 HIS 삶에 상처를 남겼습니다.

MusicLover26.title: 음악 사랑꾼
MusicLover26.desc: 어릴 적에, NAME(은)는 악기 연주와 노래에 재능이 있었습니다. HE 전문 교육을 받았고, 연주회나 콘서트에서 공연하는 것을 좋아했습니다. 뭐, 후한 칭찬이 HIM 약간 자기중심적으로 만들긴 했습니다.

ChildStar51.title: 어린 스타
ChildStar51.desc: NAME(은)는 HECAP가 살던 행성에서 영화나 TV쇼에 나오는 어린 스타로 유명했습니다. HIS 명성은 HIM 다양한 사람들과 만나게 하였을 뿐만 아니라, HECAP가 이것저것 배울 수 있게도 해줬습니다.

ChildSpy95.title: 어린 스파이
ChildSpy95.desc: 아이들은 보통 순수하다고 여겨져서, 스파이로서 이상적입니다. NAME(은)는 HECAP가 겨우 9살일 때 잠입 기술과 정보 수집 방법을 훈련받았습니다. HECAP가 적진을 누비고 전쟁으로 황폐해진 HIS 행성을 돌아다니며 보낸 세월은, HECAP가 교육받을 기회가 거의 없었다는 것을 의미하기도 합니다.

Shopkeeper18.title: 장사꾼
Shopkeeper18.desc: NAME의 어머니는 자주 아팠습니다, 그래서 HECAP가 가게를 운영해서 버는 돈이 유일한 수입원이었습니다. HE HECAP가 파는 이국적인 공예품들에 대해서 조금 배웠고, 사고파는 노하우도 많이 늘었습니다.

Nurse0.title: 간호사
Nurse0.desc: NAME(은)는 산업 시대 병원에서 붕대를 갈거나 체온을 재는 것과 같이 판에 박힌 일들을 했습니다. 바쁜 일이긴 했지만, HE 언제나 환자들과 잡담하는 시간을 찾을 수 있었습니다.

HouseServant78.title: 가정집 하인
HouseServant78.desc: HECAP가 아직 한창 젊을 때, NAME(은)는 납치되어 어느 부유한 귀족들의 하인으로 팔려나갔습니다. HE는 주인의 저택에 있는 주방과 지하실에 대해 잘 알게 되었지만, 야외에서는 어떤 일도 하지 않았습니다.

Bodyguard22.title: 경호원
Bodyguard22.desc: NAME(은)는 중간계에서, 누구든 대가를 지급하면 위험으로부터 지켜주는 일을 찾았습니다. HE 온갖 종류의 전투 유형에 능숙해진 데다가, HECAP에게 거스른 자들에게는 무자비하다고 합니다.

Novelist96.title: 소설가
Novelist96.desc: NAME(은)는 번화계에 살면서, 아주 성공적인 소설을 썼습니다. HE 낮에는 글을 쓰고 밤에는 파티하면서 자유분방하게 살았습니다. 살면서 낮에 육체노동을 한 적은 한 번도 없습니다.

Mathematician18.title: 수학자
Mathematician18.desc:
NAME(은)는 대학에서 수학 연구를 진행했습니다.
HE 대부분의 여가를 사격 시뮬레이션에서 보냈지만 끔찍한 실력으로 다른 플레이어들의 놀림감이 되곤 했습니다.

Paramedic85.title: 구급대원
Paramedic85.desc: NAME의 일은 응급의료상황에 신속하게 출동하는 것이었습니다. HE 제한적인 의료용품만 가지고 심각한 부상을 치료하는 것에 익숙합니다. HE 오랜 기간 많은 총상을 치료해 왔기 때문에, 총을 보면 꺼림칙해 합니다.

Castaway74.title: 조난자
Castaway74.desc: NAME(은)는 사람이 살지 않는 동물계에서 난파한 배의 유일한 생존자입니다. HECAP가 구조되기까지 수년간, HE 찾을 수 있는 건 무엇이든지 구해왔습니다. HIS 생존 기술은 레이저같이 날카로워졌지만, 너무나 오랫동안 홀로 지내서 의사소통 능력이 약해졌습니다.

Gardener25.title: 정원사
Gardener25.desc: 산업계에서, 부는 공장을 소유하고, 상품을 파는 사람들에게 집중되어 있습니다. NAME(은)는 그런 부유한 가족의 저택에서 부리는 하인들의 일원으로서, 호화로운 정원을 가꾸는 일을 했습니다.

MafiaBoss49.title: 마피아 두목
MafiaBoss49.desc: NAME(은)는 한 도시계 범죄 조직의 고위 간부였습니다. HE 공무원들에게 뇌물을 줬고, 부하들의 충성심을 유지했으며, 연체된 납부금을 뜯어냈습니다. 필요한 어떤 방법이든 써서 말입니다.

Torturer24.title: 고문 기술자
Torturer24.desc: 중세계의 한 폭군을 위해 일하면서, NAME(은)는 '설득'의 전문가라는 명성을 얻었습니다. 지하 감옥으로 끌려간 어떤 수감자도 비밀을 남길 수 없었습니다. NAME의 미소는 그들의 악몽 속에 영원히 남게 됐습니다.

ConstructionEngineer77.title: 건설 기술자
ConstructionEngineer77.desc: NAME(은)는 중간계에서 건설업에 종사했습니다. HE 사무실부터 대성당까지 다 짓는 팀을 이끌었습니다. HE 바쁘고, 근처에는 패스트푸드 가게가 무척 많았기 때문에 음식을 직접 만들어 본 적이 없습니다.

Blacksmith19.title: 대장장이
Blacksmith19.desc: 중세계의 대장장이로서, NAME(은) HIS 작품이 무척 뛰어난 것으로 유명했습니다. 또한, HE 자신이 만든 검을 다루는 데도 나쁘지 않았습니다.

CharityWorker80.title: 자선단체 직원
CharityWorker80.desc: 번화계는 그곳에 살 정도로 운이 좋은 사람에게는 안전하고 편안한 천국입니다. 그러나, NAME(은)는 빈곤으로 고통받는 주변 행성들을 무시할 수 없었습니다. HE 기부를 호소하고, 도움이 필요한 사람들을 지원해주는 일을 했습니다.

Defector59.title: 탈주자
Defector59.desc: HECAP가 한창 젊은 나이일 때, NAME(은)는 억압적인 독재 국가에서 도망치기로 했습니다. HIS 탈출은 성공적이지 못했고, 요원들이 HIM 쫓기 위해 보내졌습니다. HE 수년간 도피하면서 자신의 부상은 스스로 치료했기 때문에 어떤 의사도 HIM 밀고할 수는 없었습니다. 이런 시련들이 HIM 배배 꼬이고 남을 믿지 못하는 성격으로 만들었습니다.

FactoryWorker82.title: 공장 노동자
FactoryWorker82.desc: NAME(은)는 산업시대의 공장에서 하찮은 단순노동에 종사했습니다. HIS 일에는 도시 여기저기로 상품을 수송하는 노새와 말을 돌보는 것도 포함되어 있었습니다.

RanchOwner88.title: 목장 주인
RanchOwner88.desc: NAME(은)는 성공적인 목장의 주인 겸 관리인이었습니다. HIS 농장에서는 고기와 털을 생산하기 위한 동물들을 길렀습니다. HE 일할 사람을 고용하는 것은 바보 같은 짓이라며 절대 하지 않았습니다.

LowWageWorker94.title: 저임금 노동자
LowWageWorker94.desc: NAME(은) HIS 가족들을 먹여 살리기 위해, 여러 가지 잡다한 일들을 하게 됐습니다. 그러면서, HE 여러 가지 기본적인 손재주들도 익힐 수 있었습니다.

Model51.title: 모델
Model51.desc: NAME(은)는 광고주들을 위해 옷이나 보석의 모델로 일했습니다. 또한, HE 가상 현실 시뮬레이션 속 캐릭터의 물리적인 모델로도 쓰였습니다.

Taxonomist49.title: 분류학자
Taxonomist49.desc: NAME(은)는 행성들을 여행하면서, 완벽한 일람표를 만들 수 있길 바라며 HECAP가 발견한 동식물의 삶을 연구하고 분류했습니다.

Geologist2.title: 지질학자
Geologist2.desc: NAME(은)는 광부와 동굴 굴착가들과 함께 일하면서, 암석의 종류와 자연적인 형성 과정을 확인했습니다. HECAP가 땅속에서 보낸 시간 동안, HE 드릴 기계와 다른 전문 장비들의 수리 경험을 쌓을 수 있었습니다.

ConventChild41.title: 수도원 아이
ConventChild41.desc: 불륜의 아이, NAME(은)는 중세 수도원 수녀들에 의해 거둬졌습니다. HE 고된 일과 복종의 가치를 배웠지만, 기술은 이단적이라고 가르침 받았습니다.

TestSubject75.title: 실험 대상
TestSubject75.desc: 가장 부패한 도시계에서, 도덕적 잣대가 없는 과학자들은 연구라는 이름으로 입에 담지 못할 잔악 행위를 저지릅니다. NAME(은)는 태어나자마자 밀폐된 시설에 홀로 남겨졌고 HIM 완벽한 슈퍼 솔져로 만들기 위해 다양한 행동 실험을 받았습니다.

MedicalAssistant75.title: 의학 조수
MedicalAssistant75.desc: NAME(은)는 양측 모두 대규모의 네이팜을 사용하는 비극적인 전쟁통에 태어났습니다. HE 의무실에서 HIS 부모님을 도우며 자랐고, 전장에 즐비한 끔찍한 화상 환자를 치료했습니다. HECAP에게 불은 트라우마로 남았습니다.

CultChild15.title: 사이비 아이
CultChild15.desc:
NAME(은)는 첨단 기술을 거부하는 강경한 사이비 집단에서 태어났고, 신성한 예술로 혼을 정화함으로써 모든 병이 치유될 수 있다고 믿었습니다.
HE 처음 외부 세계를 접한 후, 도망가기로 했습니다.

WreckageExplorer75.title: 잔해 탐험가
WreckageExplorer75.desc: NAME(이)가 태어나기 두 세대 전, 종말 전쟁으로 HIS 고향 행성은 무법 상태가 됐습니다. NAME에게는 HIS 부족을 지킬 책임이 있었지만, 행성 주변에 흩어진 추락한 전함들을 탐험하려고 책임을 회피하곤 했습니다.

ApocalypseSurvivor86.title: 종말의 생존자
ApocalypseSurvivor86.desc: NAME(은)는 HIS 고향이 기후 변화로 인한 대기근과 홍수로 종말 위기에 놓인, 불안정한 시기에 태어났습니다. HECAP가 자라면서 상황은 악화됐습니다. 수십억 명이 죽었고 평화롭던 국가가 무법 상태가 됐습니다. HIS 부모님과 NAME(은)는 살아남으려고 무슨 짓이든 했습니다.

StoryWriter68.title: 소설 작가
StoryWriter68.desc: 어렸을 때, NAME(은)는 독서 중독이었습니다. HE 지역 도서관에서 책에 코 박은 채 온종일을 보내곤 했습니다. 예산 삭감으로 인해 도서관이 폐쇄되자, NAME(은)는 방황했습니다. HE 부족함을 메우려고 HECAP 자신만의 이야기를 쓰기로 했습니다.

Sailor53.title: 선원
Sailor53.desc: NAME(은)는 답사 여정 동안 대양을 가로지르고, 이국적인 곳의 동식물 표본을 찾으며, 때로는 해적의 공격을 막아냈습니다. HE 바다를 너무 좋아해서 모은 보물을 파는 일을 제외하고, 땅 위에서 하는 최소한의 일 외에 모든 일을 거부했습니다.

Jailbird93.title: 상습범
Jailbird93.desc: NAME(은)는 일생 대부분을 감옥에서 보냈는데, 그곳에서 주방일을 맡아왔습니다. HE 싸우려는 기질이 있고 공격적인 말투를 가졌습니다.

Actor76.title: 배우
Actor76.desc: NAME(은)는 극단과 HIS 고향을 순회하며, 꽉 찬 극장과 사랑하는 관객을 위해 어디서든 공연했습니다. HE 완벽주의자여서, 가지고 있는 것만 쓰기보다 HECAP 자신만의 소품과 의상을 만들었습니다.

Tactician22.title: 전술가
Tactician22.desc: NAME(은)는 대규모 행성 전쟁이 빈번한, 불안정한 성계의 우주 해군에 입대했습니다. HE 전투에 예리한 감각이 있음이 드러나서, 이내 효과적으로 대군을 지휘하는 데 능숙해졌습니다.

GlitterworldOfficer93.title: 번화계 장교
GlitterworldOfficer93.desc:
번화계는 평화로운 곳이지만, 전쟁을 대비하는 경우가 많습니다. NAME의 부대는 실제 전투를 겪어보지도 못했습니다.
HE 예술적인 취미를 추구했지만, HIS 부대원들은 그들끼리 싸움을 즐겼기 때문에, NAME(은)는 싸움을 말리는 데 익숙했습니다.

Taster35.title: 감별사
Taster35.desc: 중세 왕의 감별사로서, 왕실 식탁에 올라가는 요리는 NAME(이)가 먼저 맛봐야 했습니다. HE 궁정에서 퇴폐적으로 살아서, 뚱뚱해지고 일은 거의 하지 않았습니다.

BiosphereManager30.title: 생태계 관리자
BiosphereManager30.desc: NAME(은)는 모든 하찮은 일은 로봇이 하고 사람들은 여가에 일생을 쏟는, 평화로운 번화계에서 태어났습니다. HE 사람들이 자연의 아름다움에 감상하려고 가는, 거대한 공원에서 동식물의 생태를 관리했습니다.

Veterinarian19.title: 수의사
Veterinarian19.desc: NAME(은)는 아프고 다친 동물들을 구하려고 치료해왔습니다. 동물들의 고통을 보는 일은 고기를 먹는 것에 대한 HIS 태도에 영향을 줬고, HE 고향의 육식 문화를 거부하고, 수년 동안 채식주의자로 살았습니다.

ExplosivesExpert30.title: 폭발물 전문가
ExplosivesExpert30.desc: NAME(은)는 광산에 고용된 폭발물 기술자였습니다. HE HIS 직업을 매우 진지하게 생각했고 전문성에 있어서 통달했습니다. 그래서 HE 철저히 계산된 폭발 후에 청소까지 도움으로써 위신을 떨어뜨리지 않으려고 했습니다.

Counselor20.title: 상담사
Counselor20.desc: NAME(이)가 젊었을 적 무서운 트라우마로 심각한 식사 장애가 있었습니다. 상담을 통해 HE 음식에 대해 건강한 마음을 가지는 법을 배웠고, HIS 새로운 기술로 다른 이들의 정서적 문제를 극복하는데 도움을 주려고 마음먹었습니다.

Recruiter51.title: 징병관
Recruiter51.desc:
NAME(은)는 전투 기술과 상처입지 않는 것으로 악명높은, 존경받는 무술가 조직의 일원이었습니다.
HE 고향을 여행하면서, 만난 젊은이들을 판단해 훈련에 적합하면 받아들이려고 했습니다.

PsychiatricPatient28.title: 정신병 환자
PsychiatricPatient28.desc:
NAME(은)는 성인이 된 후 대부분을 정신병동에서 보냈습니다. HIS 산업화된 고향에서는 정신 질환에 대한 이해가 부족해서, HE 사람이라기보다 동물로 취급됐습니다.
HE 결국 회복되어 풀려났지만, HIS 경험으로 기본적인 생활기술의 상당 부분이 약화됐습니다.

Drifter25.title: 떠돌이
Drifter25.desc:
NAME(은)는 HIS 삶에 무엇을 해야 할지 생각하지 않습니다. HE 머무른 곳 어디든 임시 노동을 하며, 자주 여행 다녔습니다.
또한 HE 관심 있는 출판사를 찾을 수만 있다면 베스트셀러가 될 거라 믿는 소설을 쓰기도 했습니다.

VRDesigner15.title: 가상현실 설계자
VRDesigner15.desc: NAME(은)는 번화계 사람들을 위한 가상 현실 시뮬레이션을 설계했습니다. HE HIS 세계를 더욱 현실적으로 만들려고 식물에 대한 모든 것을 배우기도 하는 등, 자잘한 것까지 큰 관심을 쏟았습니다.

HumanComputer63.title: 인간 컴퓨터
HumanComputer63.desc: NAME(은)는 뛰어난 기억력과 복잡한 계산을 암산할 수 있는 능력이 있다고 알려졌습니다. 한 중간계 독재자는 전자 컴퓨터가 해킹에 너무 취약해진 이후, 정부의 재정과 지출 관리자로 NAME(을)를 고용하기로 했습니다.

Architect11.title: 건축가
Architect11.desc: NAME(은)는 건물을 설계하고 건설했습니다. HIS 고향 번화계에서는, 건축의 기술적 측면 대부분은 인공지능이 처리했습니다. 이런 환경은 HIM 기술의 예술적 한계를 뛰어넘도록 했고, 건설 현장에서 HIS 손을 더럽힐 필요가 없었습니다.

MessageCarrier61.title: 전갈 배달부
MessageCarrier61.desc: 중세계에서, 전갈을 보내는 가장 빠른 방법은 말을 탄 누군가에게 맡기고 여정에서 살아남기를 바라는 것입니다. NAME(이)가 그 누군가였습니다.

Sculptor16.title: 조각가
Sculptor16.desc: NAME(은)는 사람 크기의 돌덩이를 조각하기 시작했지만, HE 곧 더 큰 것을 생각했습니다. 광산 로봇의 도움으로, HE 절벽에 거대한 기념물을 조각하는 법을 배웠습니다. 곧 HECAP가 살았던 번화계의 자연 공원은 거대한 암석 조각들로 가득찼습니다.

MachineCollector23.title: 기계 수집가
MachineCollector23.desc:
NAME(은)는 오래된 기계와 신비로운 기술들에 사로잡혔습니다. HE 어디서든 기계들을 얻어냈고, 개별적으로 어떻게 작동하는지 보는 것을 좋아했습니다.
HE 주변 사람들이 듣는 것을 멈춰도, HIS 수집품에 대해 오랫동안 얘기하는 습관이 있습니다.

Sheriff37.title: 보안관
Sheriff37.desc: NAME(은)는 외딴 산업 도시의 법 집행자였습니다. HE 거만한 태도와 야비한 구석으로 유명했습니다. HE 돈, 술 또는 복수를 위한 것이 아니면 손가락 까딱하지 않았습니다.

ConArtist96.title: 사기꾼
ConArtist96.desc: NAME(은)는 인생에서 어떤 것도 창출한 적 없습니다. HE 다른 이들이 스스로 만든 것을, 자연스럽게 HIM 주도록 했습니다.

Gatherer34.title: 채집가
Gatherer34.desc: NAME(은)는 채집 장인입니다. HE 식물, 뿌리, 열매에 대한 HIS 깊은 지식으로, 가장 척박한 땅에서도 식량을 찾을 수 있습니다.

Loner43.title: 외톨이
Loner43.desc:
외톨이는 부족회의나 연간 축제를 절대 좋아하지 않습니다. HE 넓은 평원과 바위 사이로 들리는 바람의 외로운 휘파람을 좋아합니다.
HE 가끔 부족을 방문하고, 대부분은 HIS 생존 기술로 자신을 돌보며 혼자 지냅니다.

AbandonedChild27.title: 버려진 아이
AbandonedChild27.desc: NAME(은)는 병약하게 태어났습니다. HECAP가 부족에게 부담만 된다 여겨, HIS 부모님은 HIM 비바람 속에 남겨두고 떠났습니다. 어찌 된 일인지, HE 살아남았습니다.

ReclusiveChild87.title: 은둔한 아이
ReclusiveChild87.desc: NAME(은)는 거의 5살이 될 때까지 말을 배우지 못했고, 심지어 그때까지도 배우지 않기를 원했습니다. HECAP가 10대 초반일 때, HE 마을에서 떠나 몇 주 동안 황무지에서 지내버릇했습니다.

Herder89.title: 목동
Herder89.desc: 어린 시절, NAME(은)는 부족의 머팔로 무리를 육식 동물로부터 안전하게 지켰고 병든 놈은 치료했습니다. 한적한 일이었지만, HE 사람들에게서 떨어지는 것을 즐겼습니다.

Scavenger86.title: 폐품수집가
Scavenger86.desc: NAME(은)는 지겨운 일상에서 벗어나기 위해 보물을 찾으려고 난파선이나 유적을 파헤치면서 어린 시절을 보냈습니다. HIS 타고난 호기심은 HIM 곤경에 빠뜨리기도 했지만, 많은 흥미로운 발견을 하기도 했습니다.

CaveChild31.title: 동굴 아이
CaveChild31.desc: NAME(은)는 산 중턱에 깊이 뻗어있는 크고 복잡한 동굴 지대에서 자랐습니다. HE 깊은 동굴을 유지 보수하는 어른들을 도왔습니다.

SoleSurvivor85.title: 유일한 생존자
SoleSurvivor85.desc: NAME의 부족원 모두가 습격에 절멸했습니다. HE 다른 부족에 받아들여졌지만, 정신적 충격을 받아서 요리와 재배를 하며 집 근처에만 머무르길 좋아했습니다.

VengefulChild49.title: 복수심에 찬 아이
VengefulChild49.desc: 어린 시절, NAME(이)가 마을로 돌아왔을 때 도적에 의해 마을이 절멸한 것을 알았습니다. HE 공격한 놈들에게 복수하기로 맹세했고 황야를 가로질러 잔인한 난동을 벌였습니다.

FireKeeper85.title: 불 파수꾼
FireKeeper85.desc: 어린 시절, NAME(은)는 부족의 불을 지키는 사명이 있었습니다. HE 그 사명을 매우 진지하게 여겼습니다.

Healer89.title: 치유사
Healer89.desc: HIS 부족 장로 치유사가 습격에 죽은 뒤, NAME(이)가 그 역할을 맡았습니다. HE 날마다 인근 지역에서 뜻밖에 효과적인 치료제로 사용되는 약초와 광물성 혼합물을 찾아내는데 보냈습니다.

Scout93.title: 정찰병
Scout93.desc: HIS 부족이 지역 이방인과 접촉한 이래, NAME(은)는 현지 지역에 대한 안내자로 고용됐습니다. 고대 유물과의 빈번한 접촉 덕분에 HE 고대 기술을 편하게 대했습니다.

Digger58.title: 땅굴군
Digger58.desc: NAME(와)과 HIS 부족은 산 측면 깊숙이 그들의 집을 파냈습니다. NAME(은)는 바위를 파내 동굴 벽을 강화하는 것을 편하게 느낍니다.

MuffaloShaman94.title: 머팔로 주술사
MuffaloShaman94.desc: HIS 침착한 지혜와 위대한 힘으로, NAME(은)는 이동하는 머팔로 무리를 따라다니는 유목 부족의 영적 지도자가 됐습니다.

LoreKeeper35.title: 전승자
LoreKeeper35.desc: NAME(은)는 HIS 부족의 대대로 이어진 전승자 중 한 명입니다. 매일 밤 불 주위에서, HE 전설을 통해 고대 지식과 유용한 지혜를 전했습니다.

Weaver90.title: 방직공
Weaver90.desc: NAME(은)는 머팔로 털실, 식물 섬유, 천연염료로 HIS 혈족을 위한 아름다운 옷을 만드는 전문가였습니다. HIS 아름다운 수공예품은 현지 부족들 사이에서 자주 거래됐습니다.

CaveTender26.title: 동굴 파수꾼
CaveTender26.desc: 다른 이들이 수렵 채집하러 나간 동안, NAME(은)는 집에서 요리하고 어리고 아픈 이들을 돌봤습니다.

Warrior37.title: 전사
Warrior37.desc: NAME(은)는 다양한 무기에 능숙한, 무시무시한 전사였습니다. HE 많은 전투에 참전했습니다.

TribeChild78.title: 부족 아이
TribeChild78.desc:
NAME(은)는 마을을 뛰어다니고, 머팔로 무리와 이동하며, 부모로부터 필수 기술을 배우면서 부족에서 자랐습니다.
HE 글을 배우지 못했고 고대 유적이 아닌 기계는 보지 못했습니다.

FallenProdigy22.title: 타락한 영재
FallenProdigy22.desc:
NAME(은)는 혼돈에 빠진 번화계에서 태어났습니다. HIS 아버지는 작전 중 사망했습니다.
HE 우트마이어 아카데미에서 장학금을 받으려고 애썼고 그곳에 있을 수 있는 자격을 증명해야 했습니다. 어린 천재인 HE 지원 대상이라고 왕따를 당했고 다른 아이들과 친구가 될 수 없었습니다.

MadScientist28.title: 미친 과학자
MadScientist28.desc:
칼로스 IX 사건의 생존자에 대한 비윤리적 실험이 공개된 후, HIS 업적이 박탈되고 추방됐습니다. NAME(은)는 변경에서 생존하는 데 필요한 기술을 익혔습니다.
잃을 것 없이 연구를 계속하면서, HE 따분한 일을 수행할 하인을 만들었습니다.

FarmKid40.title: 농가 꼬마
FarmKid40.desc: NAME(은)는 가족의 소농가에서 자랐습니다. HE 들판에서 일하고 동물을 돌보는 것을 즐겼습니다.

CivilEngineer41.title: 토목 기술자
CivilEngineer41.desc: NAME(은)는 잘 알려진 토목 기술자였습니다. HIS 직업은 암석 강화 건물을 설계하고 유지하는 것과 관련되어 있습니다. HE 정신을 집중하려고 통계 분석을 충분히 했습니다.

FarmerBoy63.title: 농가 아이
FarmerBoy63.desc:
NAME의 부모님은 HECAP가 7살일 때 화재로 사망했습니다. HE 삼촌의 농장에서 밭을 갈고 육체노동을 하며 자랐습니다.
HE 부모에 대한 질문에 대답할 수 없어서, 사회적 접촉 대신 힘들게 일했습니다.

ArmyCook51.title: 육군 요리사
ArmyCook51.desc: NAME(은)는 육군에 노동자로 입대했고 대부분 시간을 요리하고 수리하는 데 보냈습니다. 위험한 행성에 주둔하는 동안, HE 기초 사격과 생존 훈련을 받았습니다.

UrbworldCriminal64.title: 도시계 범죄자
UrbworldCriminal64.desc:
인구 과잉 도시계의 안 좋은 환경에서 태어난, NAME(은)는 굶주림과 저체온증을 피하고자 삼류 범죄를 저질렀습니다.
HECAP에게 강도와 살인은 일상 활동이었습니다. NAME(은)는 살아남는 게 이기는 것이라고 배웠습니다.

UrbworldPolitican16.title: 도시계 정치인
UrbworldPolitican16.desc:
그 기업이 도시계의 대부분을 소유한 것은 공공연하지만, 누군가는 뇌물을 받았을 것입니다. NAME(이)가 그러한 대표적 인물입니다.
HE 펜트하우스에서 편하게 살면서 사람들의 꿈과 희망을 조종하는 법을 배웠습니다.

OptimisticChild43.title: 낙천적 아이
OptimisticChild43.desc: NAME(은)는 사랑하는 부모님과 쾌적한 중간계 생활로 행복했습니다. HE 친구 사귀기와 얘기 듣는 것을 좋아하는 낙천적이고 붙임성 있는 꼬마였습니다. HIS 상상력 때문에 아이디어와 질문이 넘쳐났습니다.

GraphicDesigner99.title: 그래픽 디자이너
GraphicDesigner99.desc: NAME의 예술 표현에 대한 관심은 HIM 디자이너의 길로 이끌었습니다. 세심한 눈으로 HE 행성에서 꽤 잘 알려진 예술가가 되었지만, HIS 꼼꼼함 때문에 한 프로젝트를 완성하는 데 너무 많은 시간을 자주 소비하게 됐습니다.

UrbworldHooligan8.title: 도시계 난동꾼
UrbworldHooligan8.desc: NAME(은)는 위험한 도시계에서 자랐습니다. HE 불법으로 매일 끼니를 때우는 법을 빠르게 배웠습니다. 그래서 요리나 재배에 필요한 공간이 남아있지 않았습니다.

SpaceTechnician89.title: 우주 전문가
SpaceTechnician89.desc: NAME(은)는 우주 정거장 근처에서 유지 보수하는 직업을 가짐으로써 마침내 범죄자 생활에서 벗어날 수 있었습니다. HE 다양한 수리, 건축 작업을 수행했습니다. 또한, HE 기초 연구 활동에 참여하고 종종 동료들의 논쟁을 중재하기도 했습니다. HE 예술을 좋아하지는 않았습니다.

IndworldUrchin11.title: 산업계 부랑아
IndworldUrchin11.desc: NAME(은)는 산업 혁명 초기 단계 세계의 거리에서 자랐습니다. HE 날마다 항상 가난을 벗어날 방법을 모색하며, 도둑질하고 구걸하고 버려진 기계 파편으로 땜일하며 보냈습니다.

DoomsdayPariah26.title: 심판의 날 부랑자
DoomsdayPariah26.desc: NAME(은)는 유적지를 뒤지는 동안 외계 지하실을 가까스로 열었습니다. HE 자신도 모르게 행성의 모든 생명을 몰살시키는 심판의 날 장치를 작동시켰습니다. 인간의 삶보다 기술에 더 관심이 많았던 HE 지하실 내 우주선에 탑승했고 더 많은 학살의 유물을 찾기 위해 출발했습니다.

MechanoidNerd80.title: 메카노이드 덕후
MechanoidNerd80.desc:
NAME(은)는 메카노이드 설계자 부부의 유일한 아이로 도시계에서 자랐습니다. 부부는 기계에 대한 HIS 관심을 장려했습니다. 결국, HE 자신이 만든 것들에 집착하게 되었습니다.
불행하게도 HE 친구보다 기술 서적을 선호했으므로 외톨이가 됐습니다.

MilitaryEngineer44.title: 군대 기술자
MilitaryEngineer44.desc:
NAME(은)는 식민지 군대의 기술자로 일했습니다. HE 무기, 살생 드론, 기타 놀잇감을 가지고 놀아야 했습니다.
HE 메카노이드 도구를 수리하고 조정하는데 전문입니다. 때때로 HE 그것을 자신에게 시험했습니다.

ColiseumCleaner12.title: 콜로세움 청소부
ColiseumCleaner12.desc: '내부 데스트리안 전쟁' 여파로, HIS 부모님은 체포됐고 HE 노예의 삶 속에서 태어났습니다. 돈 때문에 유혈이 낭자한 전투 뒤의 콜로세움을 청소해야 했습니다. 보고, 기다리고, 배웠습니다. 콜로세움이 HECAP가 알던 유일한 곳이었습니다. 콜로세움을 청소하던 어느 밤, HIS 가족은 살해됐습니다.

ColiseumFighter29.title: 콜로세움 투사
ColiseumFighter29.desc: 수년간 투사들 주변에서 얻은 지식을 이용해서, HE 한때 청소했던 콜로세움에서 성공적인 검투사가 됐습니다.

OfficerCadet81.title: 사관생도
OfficerCadet81.desc: 어렸을 때부터 NAME(은)는 병사의 지휘관이 되도록 훈련받았습니다. HE 어렸을 때 바누 국방 대학에 입학했고 다양한 무기와 생존 기술에 숙달됐습니다.

FighterController64.title: 전투기 관제사
FighterController64.desc: 자르타 위기 중, NAME(은)는 많은 세계에서 참전했고 전투기 관제사로서 지상과 공중 사이의 중요한 연결로를 제공했습니다. 전쟁 중, HE 다치고 죽은 전우를 봤습니다. 이 트라우마는 HIS 꿈에 자주 나타났지만, HIS 조준은 여전히 예리했습니다.

ReclusiveProdigy98.title: 은둔한 영재
ReclusiveProdigy98.desc:
번영하는 번화계에서 자란 것은 NAME에게 HIS 학업에 전념할 기회를 제공했습니다.
어렸을 때부터 유전자 변형과 신경계 증대에 열렬한 관심을 가진, HE 어린 시절에 시간(또는 욕망)이 거의 없었습니다.

FerventResearcher44.title: 열렬한 연구원
FerventResearcher44.desc:
청소년기에, NAME(은)는 HIS 행성과 사람들이 초월의 시대에 근접했다고 확신했습니다.
HIS 연구가 기폭제가 될 것이라는 확고한 신념은 HIM 점점 더 걱정스러운 행동을 하도록 만들었고 생명윤리위원회는 HIS 진전을 막기 위해 노력했습니다.

WarRefugee81.title: 전쟁 난민
WarRefugee81.desc:
NAME의 고향 행성은 전쟁을 겪었습니다.
긁어 모을 수 있는 조금의 음식과 소지품만 챙긴 후, HE와 HIS 아버지는 함선을 훔쳐 우주로 도피했습니다.

VengefulExplorer48.title: 복수심에 찬 탐험가
VengefulExplorer48.desc:
집 없는 떠돌이 NAME(은)는 HIS 아버지와 함께 수 백년간 많은 전투에 참여했고 백발의 전사가 되었습니다.
아버지의 전사 후에 HE 아버지를 죽인 자를 찾아 복수하기 위한 여행을 홀로 시작했습니다.

WorkCampSlave37.title: 노동수용소 노예
WorkCampSlave37.desc:
NAME(은)는 어느 중세계의 성질 더럽기로 유명한 가문의 노비로 자랐습니다.
HE 어떤 정식 교육도 받지 못했지만 가혹한 노동이 NAME의 몸을 단단하게 만들었습니다.

BanishedSoldier4.title: 추방된 군인
BanishedSoldier4.desc:
NAME(은)는 모든 노예 중 제일 덩치가 좋았으며 남는 시간은 강박적으로 자신의 몸을 만드는 일에 소비했습니다. 그리고 노력한 시간들은 HECAP가 주인의 개인 경호원으로 임명됐을 때 빛을 발했습니다.
나중에, HE 경호원의 지위를 이용하여 주인을 살해하고 노예들을 해방하려는 계획을 세웠지만 곧 발각되어 목숨만 간신히 건진 채 도망쳐야 했습니다.

DisciplinedFarmer44.title: 훈육 받은 농부
DisciplinedFarmer44.desc:
NAME(은)는 수익을 내기 위해 고전하던 미개척지 농장의 둘째 아들이었습니다. NAME의 아버지는 매우 엄격해서 자식들에게 항상 열심히 일하고 말은 적게 하라고 항상 강조했습니다.
요리를 하다 손을 한 번 데인 이후로 NAME(은)는 굶어죽기 직전이 아니면 다시는 요리하지 않겠다고 다짐했습니다.

StalwartFarmer89.title: 건장한 농부
StalwartFarmer89.desc: 도적떼의 지속적인 위협 아래서 NAME(은)는 아버지의 장총으로 자신을 지키는 법을 배웠습니다. HE 가축을 가두고 야생동물을 막는 울타리 건설법도 숙달했습니다. 한 때는 아버지의 그림을 그리려고 시도했지만 선 뭉치와 오리 말고는 그릴 수 있는게 없다는걸 깨달았습니다.

VoyagerChild9.title: 항해자 아이
VoyagerChild9.desc:
NAME(은)는 연구개발 함선에서 태어나 대부분의 유년기를 항해하며 보냈습니다.
어느 날 NAME의 함선은 기이한 미행성에 접근하다가 심각한 피해를 입었습니다. HIS 다음 기억은 함선이 완전히 수리된 후에 궤도를 빠져나가는 것이었습니다. 곧 HE 기술 연구에 대한 신비한 재능을 얻었습니다.

SpaceResearcher5.title: 우주 연구원
SpaceResearcher5.desc:
NAME(은)는 부모의 함선을 상속받아 연구를 계속했습니다.
유년기에 접한 다양한 문화는 우주에서의 고립된 생활에도 불구하고 남을 배려하는 성격을 부여했습니다.

VatgrownMedic86.title: 인공배양 간호병
VatgrownMedic86.desc: 전투 간호병으로 길러진 NAME(은)는 의료기술 외에도 개인화기 훈련도 수료했습니다. HE 부상당한 군인에게 접근할 때마다 좋아하던 문구 "삶이냐 죽음이냐"를 읊곤 했습니다. 대부분 삶을 선택했습니다.

GeneticScientist4.title: 유전학 과학자
GeneticScientist4.desc: 전쟁 후 NAME(은)는 유전공학 기업에 입사해 인간과 동물 향상 부서에서 일했습니다. 상처를 입히고 치유한 경험은 업무에 큰 도움이 됐지만, 남들이 보기에 불편하고 어두운 유머감각을 얻었고, 다른 사람과의 모임에서 분위기를 어색하게 만들곤 했습니다.

CoreDilettante99.title: 도심의 예술애호가
CoreDilettante99.desc:
NAME(은)는 spent her formative years on a glitterworld in the core region, where she and her friends pursued lives of idle pleasure.
As she grew up, she began to find the life of ease unfulfilling. She decided to look for a more challenging path.

Reporter51.title: 기자
Reporter51.desc:
NAME spent many years as an investigative reporter. She was notorious for making chaotic reports from exotic locations.
Although seen as a lightweight by her critics, she managed to break several high-profile stories after lengthy investigations.

AspiringPopIdol61.title: 아이돌 지망생
AspiringPopIdol61.desc:
NAME(은)는 회사 매니저들의 보살핌을 받으며 다음번 대세 아이돌이 되기 위한 노래와 안무 연습을 거쳤습니다.
직접 일은 해본 적이 없지만 음악과 몸가짐에 대해서는 많이 배울 수 있었습니다.

PopIdol50.title: 아이돌
PopIdol50.desc: NAME(은)는 공연과 인터뷰를 자주 진행했고, 덕분에 노래와 안무 실력은 물론 다른 사람과의 소통에도 뛰어납니다.

FarmBoy56.title: 농가 아이
FarmBoy56.desc:
NAME worked on his family's farm, looking after the animals and treating them when they were injured. Preferring hands-on tasks and the outdoors, he avoided softer jobs that might have kept him cooped up inside.
He enjoyed this lonely work, and tended to stay out of people's way and do his own thing.

UnstableButcher98.title: 불안정한 도살자
UnstableButcher98.desc: NAME began hearing voices. The animals were talking to him, insulting him. He came to hate them, and eventually killed his furry former friends. He started selling the meat just to get human interaction.

StationWhelp51.title: 정거장 꼬마
StationWhelp51.desc: NAME spent his childhood as a penniless orphan living on a space station. He managed to scrape by doing filthy jobs and stealing. He became so violent due to poor treatment by his “betters” that he was banished from the station, just to be picked up by space pirates.

PirateKing62.title: 해적 왕
PirateKing62.desc: With no real care for other people, NAME fit in perfectly with the pirate crew that he had once been a captive of. Shortly after becoming one of the crew, NAME began to kill anyone or anything that got in his way—including his crew mates.

ConstructionGrunt79.title: 건설 도우미
ConstructionGrunt79.desc:
Growing up in his father's lab, NAME was given the life of an intellectual elite. He got everything he desired, and price was never an object.
However NAME did not partake in the luxury given to him. Instead, he pursued more physical, and - in his father's eyes - lower-class jobs.

MilitaryInventor44.title: 군대 발명가
MilitaryInventor44.desc:
NAME, in a final act of rebellion, left his father's lab and joined the local Imperial military.
He used his laboratory skills to design machines of war. At this he was one of the best on his planet.

StudentEngineer40.title: 공학 학생
StudentEngineer40.desc:
A genius child, NAME was put in a special training program covering aerospace warfare and engineering.
One day, he tried to befriend a squirrel by giving it a bracelet. The squirrel bit him, earning him the nickname Squirrel Boy. NAME came to believe that work involving manual labor is beneath HIM.

EngineeredPilot99.title: 공학도 조종사
EngineeredPilot99.desc:
After his province was besieged by one of its neighbors, NAME volunteered for a generic modification program that created pilots for the very fighter craft that he had helped develop. The modifications allowed him to pilot the ship, but also made him less able to focus on the people around him.
By this time, people were calling him "Squirrel."

StreetKid29.title: 길바닥 꼬마
StreetKid29.desc:
Growing up on the streets of the a desert planet, NAME's his only friend was a dog named Rest. The pair scraped by, finding just enough food to survive.
When HE was 13 years old, an interplanetary criminal group took HIM under their wing.

BanditLeader92.title: 도적 두목
BanditLeader92.desc: NAME rose up the ranks of the crime organization, eventually becoming the leader of one of their most remote cells of bandits. His dog Rest never left his side.

FrontierMarshal0.title: 국경 보안관
FrontierMarshal0.desc:
NAME inherited a sense of duty from his father, and began a law enforcement career on his frontier homeworld.
He tried to uphold the law with honor, but the corruption and greed of local government officials often discouraged him.

ColonialGovernor77.title: 식민지 총독
ColonialGovernor77.desc:
Disillusioned by rampant government corruption, NAME ran for governor and won. However, the local gangs and their pet officials soon forced him out of power.
He left the community to return to his life as a marshal.

MercenaryRecruit12.title: 용병 신입
MercenaryRecruit12.desc:
Descended from a long line of off-world mercenaries, NAME grew up in a busy trading hub.
HISCAP's interest in the foreign goods at the market often distracted him from his chores and training.

MercenaryChef30.title: 용병 주방장
MercenaryChef30.desc:
Following in his family's footsteps, NAME was a soldier for hire.
He is a naturally gifted sharpshooter. However, his real passion is in perfecting a new recipe or dissecting a new gadget.

AbandonedChild78.title: 버려진 아이
AbandonedChild78.desc: NAME was a quick witted, funny child. One day, HE wandered off on HIS wealthy genetic parents, and was ultimately lost in a supposedly unused ore warehouse. Due to cloning technology, HIS parents decided that the time looking for HIM was better spent on just cloning a better son.

CargoPilot0.title: 화물선 조종사
CargoPilot0.desc: NAME was brought up by cargo hands on a long-haul ore transport ship. HECAP perfected HIS skills at trading and manipulation of people while running weapons between systems.

TradersChild31.title: 상인의 아이
TradersChild31.desc:
NAME grew up in a family of nomadic traders, making a living from selling and buying goods on many worlds.
NAME learned the customs and methods of trade of many cultures by participating in his parents' business.

SpaceHumanitarian98.title: 우주 인도주의자
SpaceHumanitarian98.desc: After seeing the rampant poverty common on overcrowded urban worlds, NAME decided to dedicate HIS life to helping the less fortunate. This crusade taught HIM how to care for the sick and the hungry.

CorpStudent17.title: 승계 수업생
CorpStudent17.desc:
NAME was bred to become an executive officer for the large space trading corporation that owned his home planet. His family had been working for that corporation for seven generations.
At age six, HE started to study at the corporate academy, where he learned to become a loyal follower and a ruthless executive.

ExecutiveOfficer58.title: 최고 경영자
ExecutiveOfficer58.desc:
NAME was an executive officer for a large space trading corporation. After a failed attempt at manipulating his way up the corporate ladder, he was framed for the rape and murder of another executive and her family.
He was found guilty. However, because of his family's influence, he was exiled instead of put to death.

VRAddict62.title: 가상현실 중독자
VRAddict62.desc: NAME was a VR head - someone who is permanently jacked into the virtual gaming universe by his spinal plug. He moved through his daily tasks barely aware of the physical reality around him. This left him nearly unable to socialize.

RugbyPlayer15.title: 럭비 선수
RugbyPlayer15.desc:
After years of addiction to virtual reality games, NAME was saved when the doctors unplugged him.
Unfortunately, they unplugged him during a match of Rugby Rampage 4. The mental backlash merged his real identity and his virtual identity, leaving him with the personality and skills of a rugby player.

Nerd92.title: 덕후
Nerd92.desc:
NAME was curious about everything. While other kids played tag in the suburbs of their industrial city, NAME read every book he could find about technology, robots, and weapons - whatever looked coolest.
His strong French accent kept him from making real friends.

StateEngineer74.title: 정부 기술자
StateEngineer74.desc:
NAME enrolled in the state weapons research program.
While brilliant in his work, he was so enthusiastic in testing his creations that he accidentally wounded some colleagues and was marked as unfit for service.

RebelSlave42.title: 반군 노예
RebelSlave42.desc:
NAME was born into corporate slavery and raised to perform menial tasks for minimum pay. HECAP was just another cog in the machine.
NAME found his freedom by joining a rebel organization whose goal was to break free from their corporate masters.

CombatNegotiator51.title: 전투 협상가
CombatNegotiator51.desc:
After escaping his homeworld, NAME took his skills to the stars.
He chose to operate as a hired gun, working for various rebel organizations, enslaved groups, and merchant enclaves. His specialty was negotiation in combat situations.

MedievalPlower12.title: 중세 시골뜨기
MedievalPlower12.desc: NAME lived on a planet where kings and queens ruled with little regard for the peasants beneath them. HISCAP family owned a large farm, but the king took most of the food it produced. This left NAME's family poor, and unable to pay for HIS education. Instead, HE was required to work the fields with HIS parents, and never had time to practice creativity.

SpaceStationCook63.title: 우주 정거장 요리사
SpaceStationCook63.desc: The space station NAME came from was far from any populated planets, and was in itself understaffed. For this reason, NAME was forced to learn how to cook in order to keep the crew alive. While HE appreciated this learning opportunity, HE didn't appreciate the criticism which came with it, and has had self-esteem issues ever since.

SonOfAHuntress96.title: 사냥여제의 후손
SonOfAHuntress96.desc:
In the mountains of the planet Ticonderoga, Jon was raised by his tribal mother. She taught him survival skills - trapping, tracking, shooting, skinning, cooking and healing.
His departed father had left behind an old bolt-action rifle, and Jon practiced with it every chance he got.

SpaceHunter67.title: 우주 사냥꾼
SpaceHunter67.desc: Now a man as well as proficient hunter and marksman, Jon yearned for more. He took leave from his birth world, traveling the great expanse in search of exotic game.

StudentSocialite73.title: 사교계 학생
StudentSocialite73.desc:
Matis learned politics in an elite training school for socially gifted students on Kalthas IV.
While he was naturally adept at reading and manipulating people, he found no joy in it. He left the academy several years before graduation.

PoliticalAssassin87.title: 정치적 암살자
PoliticalAssassin87.desc:
Matis realized that his true calling was in physical solutions to diplomatic problems. He sought training from the assassins guild on Ceti V.
He was a quick study at the arts of subterfuge and death. He soon earned the guild rank of Deathjack.

AwkwardNerd12.title: 꼴사나운 덕후
AwkwardNerd12.desc: Always fascinated by machines, Dave spent his time studying robotics and holography. He preferred the company of his scientific creations to that of other people.

AIResearcher30.title: 인공지능 연구원
AIResearcher30.desc: Dave was a renowned researcher in artificial intelligence, robotics, and interactive holography. His friendships with the artificial minds he created gave him the confidence to interact with real people, and he soon excelled at personal communication.

MidworldGeek88.title: 중간계 괴짜
MidworldGeek88.desc: NAME grew up in a quiet suburban neighborhood. He was never a master of social interaction, but his interest in computers blossomed into a true talent at an early age.

ArmyScientist54.title: 육군 과학자
ArmyScientist54.desc: NAME did scientific research for a planetary army. HECAP studied war scenarios and designed weapon systems to help win battles with a minimum of fuss.

CatHerder45.title: 고양이 목동
CatHerder45.desc:
NAME helped out in his father's cat breeding business, socializing, herding, and feeding hundreds of cats.
When he refused to clean up after the cats, HE was transferred to the breeding science division.

FelineScientist25.title: 고양이과 과학자
FelineScientist25.desc: NAME became a renowned scientist in the field of felines. Wanting the best for his animals and specializing in selective breeding, he set out on a journey to find the perfect breeding grounds for his cats.

Scavenger26.title: 폐품수집가
Scavenger26.desc:
NAME grew up in one of the few remaining cities on a world ravaged by nuclear war.
HECAP learned to survive on HIS own in this post-apocalyptic wasteland by scavenging for technology and supplies.

SpaceMarine90.title: 우주 해병
SpaceMarine90.desc:
NAME was recruited into the security forces of an off-planet corporation.
HECAP defended their ships against pirates and engaged in private space warfare contracts.

VatgrownAssassin17.title: 인공배양 암살자
VatgrownAssassin17.desc: Vas was not made as a man, but a cold hearted assassin. He was bio-engineered by scientists, and trained as a killer. He was bred to have no emotion, no feelings, and no care for who lives, and who dies.

Mercenary40.title: 용병
Mercenary40.desc: Vas spent his teenage years as a mercenary, being hired to kill and maim others. He was tall, menacing, and frightening. He could instill fear into the hearts of any man who crossed him, and kill anyone he wanted.

HiveWorldChild62.title: 군락계 아이
HiveWorldChild62.desc:
NAME had an isolated upbringing in an urbworld hive city. His hatred of heights kept him indoors often, and made him an introverted child.
When HE did go out onto the catwalks of the city, HE enjoyed playing war games, becoming proficient with various simulation weapons.

Microbiologist37.title: 미생물학자
Microbiologist37.desc:
A plague struck NAME's native urbworld. NAME and other researchers revealed that the illness was a bioweapon, but the people turned on them, blaming them for the sickness.
NAME barely escaped his homeworld as it fell into chaos.

StarforceCadet91.title: 스타포스 생도
StarforceCadet91.desc:
제국의 번화계 수도 아멘-티에서 자란 NAME(은)는 편한 유년기를 보냈습니다.
소년 시절, NAME(은)는 제국에 보답할 수 있도록 스타포스에 입대했습니다.

AceFighterPilot70.title: 최우수 전투기 조종사
AceFighterPilot70.desc:
NAME(은)는 스타 아카데미를 명예롭게 졸업한 후, 보다 우월하고 공격적인 적대 문명을 상대로 한, 세 번의 작전에서 최우수 전투기 조종사으로서 두각을 보였습니다.
그러나 어느 치열한 전투 후에 HIS 모함은 파괴되고 자기자신도 고립되고 말았습니다. 어떤 곳으로도 갈 수 없자, HE 탈출 포드에 탑승한 후 기도했습니다.

Stableboy75.title: 마구간지기
Stableboy75.desc:
NAME(은)는 중세계의 마구간지기였고, 생활비를 벌기 위해 거의 매일같이 똥을 치워야 했습니다.
유년기를 벗어날 즈음, HE 그간 모아놓은 돈으로 우주 상인에게 부탁해 고향을 떠날 수 있었습니다.

Brigand23.title: 도적
Brigand23.desc: NAME(은)는 한 때 HECAP가 친구라고 불렀던 도적단과 항해했습니다. 심지어 자기 소유의 우주선 '똥쟁이 2000'도 있었습니다.

ArtfulDodger87.title: 교묘한 기피자
ArtfulDodger87.desc:
Robin grew up on one of the urbworlds and had to fend for himself all his life. He never trusted anyone, relying on his persuasiveness and cunning to survive.
He soon became skilled with firearms and knives as well as words.

Assassin16.title: 암살자
Assassin16.desc:
Robin was specially trained as an operative to be used for high-risk assassinations. His skill with a rifle was unrivalled.
He was eventually betrayed by his superiors when a target found out about the hit and offered to fund their future projects. Robin swore to never trust anyone again.

Pickpocket6.title: 소매치기
Pickpocket6.desc: Orphaned and abandoned on the tumultuous streets of his polluted, teeming homeworld, NAME survived by deft hand and fleet foot. A natural born thief and trickster, HE rose to prominence early, running the notorious and violent urchin gang 'Doomben Rats'.

BusinessGangster83.title: 사업 조직폭력배
BusinessGangster83.desc: Staying one step ahead of the law, NAME became a legitimate businessman and silenced anyone who dared say otherwise. As proprietor of brothels, speakeasies and eateries, NAME's good fortune continued while his competition suffered a series of unfortunate and unexplained accidents.

DisasterSurvivor58.title: 재난 생존자
DisasterSurvivor58.desc:
Steven was uprooted when marauders attacked his family farm, destroying machinery and killing farmhands and beasts alike.
After the death of all he knew, he was left in the ruins to fend for himself.

ParamilitaryAgent3.title: 준군사조직 요원
ParamilitaryAgent3.desc: After scraping by on assorted shady jobs, NAME joined with a large paramilitary group to fight a war on HIS homeworld. HISCAP role was infiltration and intelligence gathering

HistoryStudent52.title: 역사학 학생
HistoryStudent52.desc: As a child, NAME spent learned many artistic forms including music and novel writing. As HE grew older, HE began to study legends from HIS home world - legends of the lizard-like beings at the center of HIS culture's folklore.

Storyteller68.title: 소설가
Storyteller68.desc:
NAME traveled his world recounting the legends that he had studied.
Obsessed with the legends of his people, NAME seeks someone who can help him grow scales on his skin, so he too can be as the ancients were.

NobleWard25.title: 귀족의 양자
NobleWard25.desc:
NAME was adopted by a prominent noble family after being left on their doorstep by HIS mother.
HECAP quickly learned secrets that passed between the nobles like cheap wine - of worlds beyond her own, languages, cultures and technologies both new and old.

InformationBroker88.title: 정보 브로커
InformationBroker88.desc:
NAME caught a ship to the next star system and began a life of travel and learning, quickly collecting a massive bank of knowledge from people of all shapes and sizes.
HECAP learned to sell this knowledge for great profit, and became a powerful broker of information.

FeralChild63.title: 야생의 아이
FeralChild63.desc:
Abandoned on an animal planet as a small child with nought but a blanket with a name embroidered on it, Felix made himself one with the wilderness.
When he was 13, he encountered a team of mineral surveyors, who "offered" him passage off of the planet.

VersatileWorker37.title: 다재다능한 노동자
VersatileWorker37.desc:
Spending his later teenage years in a colony of settlers, he offered what little skills he had to anyone who would take him.
Being a quick learner, he honed many of his skills and, apart from his crippling inability to understand fire, is now a fully functioning adult.

SpoiledChild32.title: 버릇없는 아이
SpoiledChild32.desc: NAME grew up the child of an industrious colony manager. In this position, most manual and dangerous tasks were forbidden by HIS parents, but on the rim everyone has to dirty their hands.

TestSubject1.title: 실험 대상
TestSubject1.desc: Kidnapped as a teenager, NAME was an unwilling test subject in experimental gene therapies for six years. Labs and scientists scare HIM.

AmateurEngineer21.title: 아마추어 기술자
AmateurEngineer21.desc: NAME grew up in a family with a military and engineering background. HECAP wanted to join the army but his father didn't like the idea, so HIS interest turned to great flying machines and works of engineering. HECAP secretly hoped that this would one day lead him to a life of galactic exploration.

AerospaceEngineer58.title: 항공우주 기술자
AerospaceEngineer58.desc: NAME was an engineer responsible for the production of aircraft and spaceships. HECAP focused on improving production lines, and was known for HIS mastery of technical and research issues.

WildChild8.title: 자연의 아이
WildChild8.desc:
NAME was abandoned on a toxic world overgrown with hostile plant life. HECAP became accustomed early to the cold burn of loneliness.
HE learned to fight, but ate his food raw and uncooked.

AlcoholicTrucker38.title: 알코올중독 트럭운전사
AlcoholicTrucker38.desc:
NAME was a space trucker working for Arcknight Industries when he killed his wife and daughter in a crash.
His body was repaired with an experimental nano-genetic therapy. Now his muscles continually regenerate and harden, and every movement tears the tissue anew. He bears the pain in silence.

HackerProdigy70.title: 해킹 영재
HackerProdigy70.desc: Wedge was raised as the only child of wealthy surgeons. After being pressured into accepting a medical apprenticeship, he snapped. He seized his inheritance and went underground to learn how to exploit computer networks. He quickly became one of the most feared hackers on his home planet.

IntelligenceAgent4.title: 정보원
IntelligenceAgent4.desc:
Because of his hacking skills, Wedge was recruited by his home planet's governing body to serve as an intelligence agent. The government trained him in combat, but he prefers psychological warfare.
Government rules proved too strict for him, so he went rogue. His current activities are unknown.

MadScientist38.title: 미친 과학자
MadScientist38.desc:
NAME grew up miserable on the plains of a neolithic planet. He found the strength to fight under the teachings of an old, broken scientist.
He quickly learned to play with people's fears, and was nicknamed 'mad scientist'.

WarChief54.title: 대족장
WarChief54.desc: NAME was a tribal gang leader on a neolithic planet. For him, the battlefield is a game, and there is nothing more fun than the fires of war.

YouthDelinquent81.title: 비행 청소년
YouthDelinquent81.desc:
NAME was the only child of celebrity sommeliers. Her parents expected her to take up the family profession, but after her third admission to a youth detention center, this career path became unlikely.
While in detention, NAME became skilled at making shanks and developed an interest in orinthology.

InvoluntaryHermit72.title: 본의 아닌 은둔자
InvoluntaryHermit72.desc: NAME’s escape pod was jettisoned onto an unexplored region of a frontier world. She eked out a lonely existence with only a herd of muffalo for company. Later, she was spotted clad in pygmy wombat furs, discussing the importance of hoof hygiene with a group of elderly muffalo.

HillbillyProdigy33.title: 두메산골 영재
HillbillyProdigy33.desc: Born on a cold hillbilly planet inhabited mainly by furred xenohumans, Benjamin grew up to the sound of bar fights and shootouts. Though his childhood was spent playing the banjo and working as a mechanic, his abnormal intelligence made him want something more; he entered medical school at age twenty.

MedicalScientist25.title: 의학 과학자
MedicalScientist25.desc: Benjamin enlisted as a doctor on a passing science vessel. Roaming the stars with a large crew of xenohumans and transbirds, he did genetic research on encountered species. He developed a deep friendship with one transbird but was forced to leave the ship when the captain dismissed all non-avians.

UrbworldUrchin35.title: 도시계 부랑아
UrbworldUrchin35.desc: Abandoned among the filthy concrete spires, NAME never knew HIS parents. HECAP never received formal education, and often resorted to doing menial labor in exchange for food. Sometimes HE lied, cheated, and stole to survive.

VoidRaider31.title: 공허 약탈자
VoidRaider31.desc: Craving adventure and glory, NAME set out across the void with a raider band, swearing his loyalty to his band and brothers, and spreading their glory through the stars with his blade and pistol in hand.

MidworldSketcher21.title: 중간계 화가
MidworldSketcher21.desc:
NAME was born into a loving but poor family.
HECAP discovered he had an artistic talent which he inherited from his father. HISCAP mother taught him the benefits of hard work and determination. As he grew older, NAME developed a fascination with technology and military history.

MidworldSailor20.title: 중간계 선원
MidworldSailor20.desc:
NAME joined his country's Royal Navy. After years as a non-commissioned officer, he eventually cracked and used the skills he had acquired to start a mutiny on his ship.
In the end, NAME was the leader of a large group of trained and dangerous pirates. He henceforth always had chefs to cook for him.

CoreWorldStudent4.title: 중심계 학생
CoreWorldStudent4.desc: Born a male named Alex, Alyssa didn't fit in well with the other boys. When very young, she preferred creative pursuits, such as crafting jewelry, over sports. She felt she had the wrong body. Luckily, her family and friends supported her sex reassignment; as a teen, she underwent surgery to become a female.

CoreWorldJeweler59.title: 중심계 보석세공사
CoreWorldJeweler59.desc: After Alyssa had completed all of her surgeries, she found that she had a lot of time and energy to dedicate to her passion: trinket crafting. She spent years perfecting her art as a jeweler, then left her home world to sell her wares across the galaxy.

MedievalSquire61.title: 중세 대지주
MedievalSquire61.desc: William grew up on a medieval planet as a knight in training. He trained directly under the king's war adviser for most of his youth, and learned to fight with a sword and shield.

MedievalKnight71.title: 중세 기사
MedievalKnight71.desc: William fought for king and country on the battlefield, where he further honed his skill as a swordsman. His greatest glory was leading a charge into an enemy courtroom and capturing the king at sword point.

StarSquire93.title: 별의 대지주
StarSquire93.desc:
Born on a medieval word, NAME's first memory is of gazing up into the night's sky.
Ever since, HE dreamed of squiring for a knight amidst the star-filled heavens. HISCAP focus on that vision left HIM somewhat single-minded.

StarKnight78.title: 별의 기사
StarKnight78.desc:
Abducted from his medieval homeworld, NAME later escaped his captors via an impressive display of swordsmanship.
For a moment, as he drifted in the escape pod, his childhood dream of becoming a knight among the stars felt so real. Then he crash-landed.

DrugMule2.title: 마약 운반책
DrugMule2.desc:
Raised in an orphanage, NAME turned towards the gang life at age ten.
He was exploited by the local gang as a drug mule to traffic "substance F" across rival gang territory. He took a bullet or two.

TestSubject82.title: 실험 대상
TestSubject82.desc: NAME enrolled in a scientific study that promised it could make HIM smarter. Unfortunately, the side effects were very different than he expected.HE went insane and killed a number of people before escaping his homeworld.

ArtisanFarmer56.title: 농사 장인
ArtisanFarmer56.desc: NAME grew up on a HIS family's glitterworld farm. They were one of the last farms on the planet that preferred traditional farming methods to glitterworld technology.

GeneticEngineer63.title: 유전학 기술자
GeneticEngineer63.desc:
NAME carried out HIS first genetic experiments on farm animals. HECAP soon grew to become quite skilled in all forms of genetic engineering.
A horrifying lab accident left him with a mortal fear of rodents.

Pampered62.title: 응석받이
Pampered62.desc:
Born on a decadent glitterworld, NAME was given every expensive toy.
This pampered lifestyle caused HIM to miss many basic life lessons. HECAP developed a special aversion to cooking, and always ordered the staff to do the kitchen work.

NinjaAssassin4.title: 닌자 암살자
NinjaAssassin4.desc:
NAME performed stiletto-precise assassinations for an interplanetary conglomerate. HECAP was assigned the most complex missions involving disguise, deception, subterfuge, and efficient violence.
A nasty incident with a potted plant and an assassination gone wrong left HIM with an aversion to plant life.

MilitaryChild84.title: 군인 자녀
MilitaryChild84.desc:
NAME grew up in a family with a rich military background. HISCAP teenage years were spent traveling system to system wherever HIS parents were deployed.
Following the tradition of HIS family, HE enlisted at the earliest possible age.

LazyProgrammer84.title: 게으른 프로그래머
LazyProgrammer84.desc:
NAME independently developed software that had a competitive edge against local urbworld corporations.
HISCAP legally questionable methods lead to a growing number in unsolved claims of intellectual property theft.

GangMember82.title: 조직원
GangMember82.desc:
NAME grew up homeless on an urbworld. HECAP was forced to fight and struggle for everything, making HIM hard and ruthless long before adulthood.
NAME would have stayed in those streets, had HE not been injured in a shootout and had his body confiscated for use by one of the worldwide city's ruling corporations.

MindwipedAssassin80.title: 정신개조 암살자
MindwipedAssassin80.desc:
The corporation took and remade NAME. They trained HIM into an tool of destruction and subversion. HE took to HIS new life, finding satisfaction in the jobs they sent HIM on.
When HE learned that they planned on disposing of HIM, NAME turned on his masters, killing several and fleeing the planet.

TestSubject90.title: 실험 대상
TestSubject90.desc:
Test subject #11,529,914 of experiment #56,048 spent her childhood in white rooms performing mental and physical tests.
Her only companion was a voice that called itself Mother. Mother rewarded success with praise - and failure with harsh punishment.

TestSubject6.title: 실험 대상
TestSubject6.desc:
NAME's tests went from geometry to quantum physics, and she could run the grand gauntlet without a scratch.
One day, Mother said that her final test lay beyond the red door, and that even if she couldn't hear her voice, Mother would always be there.

FireScarredChild32.title: 화상 흉터의 아이
FireScarredChild32.desc: Duster was an active child who lived an uneventful childhood until he fell into a fire and suffered horrific burns to his hands and arms. Although the scars have faded, he can't bear to be in close proximity to fire.

SpaceshipSalesman6.title: 우주선 외판원
SpaceshipSalesman6.desc: Duster tried his hand at various jobs, including building space rabbit cages and working at a mutant wheat research project. Finally, he found his true calling as a spacecraft salesman. Specializing in recreational spacecraft, his smooth talk and charming nature served him well.

TechEnthusiast65.title: 기술광
TechEnthusiast65.desc: Michael had all the latest gadgets as a child. He spent all his time playing games with AIs instead of with other children. He always felt awkward around new people.

AIProgrammer5.title: 인공지능 프로그래머
AIProgrammer5.desc:
Michael enlisted in the military's robotics division, developing smarter combat AI.
The whole time he was there, he never spoke with another human. He spent all his time conversing with the AI he was developing.

DiplomatsChild66.title: 외교관의 아이
DiplomatsChild66.desc:
NAME was born in diplomatic family.
Travelling often, HE was home-schooled and saw the world mostly through a computer.

WhiteHatHacker49.title: 선량한 해커
WhiteHatHacker49.desc: From HIS computer, NAME helped rid the online world of bad people.

Winerunner96.title: 와인 배달부
Winerunner96.desc:
Abandoned by his parents, NAME was raised by the monks of the Novo Mosteiro dos Jerónimos monastery on Aracena VI.
The monks taught him discipline and hard work. In return, HE would go into the city and 'acquire' exotic wines for the monks' nightly tastings.

VinhoKing50.title: 와인의 왕
VinhoKing50.desc:
After prohibition came to Aracena VI, NAME expanded his underground liquor business until it dominated the market on two continents. They called him the Vinho King.
Though HE mostly controlled his competition by masterful political maneuvering, HE was not above the occasional beat-down or stiletto assassination.

StreetChild49.title: 길바닥 아이
StreetChild49.desc: NAME's drug addict mother died, leaving HIM an orphan at a young age. To stay alive, HE resorted to theft, and when necessary, prostitution. When NAME was caught stealing from a church, the priestess saw a wounded but smart child, and took HIM in to give HIM a second chance at life.

SlaveChemist35.title: 노예 약사
SlaveChemist35.desc: NAME became a gifted pharmaceutical scientist, but was captured by slavers. HECAP was sold to a warlord and forced to create drugs to test on other slaves. This left HIM with deep and troubling questions on the ethics of scientific research and medicine.

SlaveFarmer49.title: 노예 농부
SlaveFarmer49.desc: Abandoned as a little girl, NAME was found by a farmer. Being infertile himself, the farmer kept her as a slave. The constant beatings left her scarred and unable to handle violence. After many years, she ran away.

RocketEngineer75.title: 로켓 기술자
RocketEngineer75.desc: NAME won a grant to a top school and earned a degree in rocket engineering. After several years working for a space mining company she left to travel and see the universe.

MedievalSlave34.title: 중세 노예
MedievalSlave34.desc: Born into slavery, Soren never knew his parents. He eventually escaped from his masters and boarded a military cargo ship, where he was pressed into military service.

SpaceMarine27.title: 우주 해병
SpaceMarine27.desc: Soren joined a squad of space marines known for their brutal efficiency at killing. His last name and his lack of emotion during combat inspired his nickname: Grim.

FoundryApprentice81.title: 수습 주물사
FoundryApprentice81.desc: NAME grew up as an apprentice in the foundries of an industrial world. This experience gave HIM metalworking skills and strong muscles, but stunted HIS artistic development.

CombatEngineer42.title: 전투 기술자
CombatEngineer42.desc: NAME became a combat engineer. HE built bases, fixed guns, and repaired vehicles for the army - when HE wasn't shooting at people, that is.

PrivilegedProdigy5.title: 금수저 영재
PrivilegedProdigy5.desc: NAME was recognized as gifted early in his glitterworld upbringing. Luckily, HIS family was in a position to cultivate that genius through advanced education. HIS training included science, leadership, and the arts.

PlanetaryDiplomat42.title: 행성 외교관
PlanetaryDiplomat42.desc: NAME's passion and profession was interplanetary politics. HE was a master of social manipulation and negotiation and devoted HIMself to working towards peace, compromise and mutual benefit.

ChildProdigy22.title: 신동
ChildProdigy22.desc: After graduating college at age twelve, Jered devoted his life to becoming immortal. However his research crossed the line when he tried to modify his body using gene therapy and mechanical augmentation. He was arrested and condemned to a prison planet.

RenegadeEngineer33.title: 탈주 기술자
RenegadeEngineer33.desc:
After a daring escape from the prison planet with a small crew of fellow inmates, Jered set his gaze on his homeworld.
He travelled there, recruited more followers, hijacked a space cruiser, and launched into the void.

BoneCollector51.title: 뼈 수집가
BoneCollector51.desc:
Born to a family of fortune hunters, NAME always had a passion for ancient history.
Though never a tough or social boy, HE loved to dig through history books as well as dirt piles.

Osteologist68.title: 골학자
Osteologist68.desc:
After graduating university at the top of his class, NAME quickly became a well-known and athletic college professor.
With his new found fame and fitness came a sudden reluctance to preform menial labor - such tasks are better left to graduate students.

GNomeSculptor81.title: 지놈 조각가
GNomeSculptor81.desc:
NAME was engineered in a lab as part of the G-nome Project. He was implanted at birth with encyclopedic knowledge of all aspects of xenobiology.
The G-nome scientists nicknamed him Gizmo and occupied him with sculpting. He developed a love of sculpting gnomes and gnome accessories.

Gnomebiologist56.title: 지놈 생물학자
Gnomebiologist56.desc:
Gizmo was a xenobiology professor in a glitterworld university. He went to conferences and managed an art gallery.
However, he never stopped sculpting yard gnomes, and considers this to be his true profession.

CircusPerformer69.title: 서커스 공연자
CircusPerformer69.desc:
Growing up in the circus, NAME learned a lot of interesting things. More interesting then the balls he juggled were the pockets he picked between shows.
A mistake with some firesticks made him develop a deathly fear of fire.

CriminalKingpin63.title: 범죄의 중심
CriminalKingpin63.desc:
NAME discovered his gift - people did what he said, when he said it. Taking advantage of this, he set off for the rimworlds planets to make a name for himself in the criminal underworld.
Having people do things for him taught him to avoid manual labor at all costs.

VatgrownSlavegirl4.title: 인공배양 무수리
VatgrownSlavegirl4.desc: Emmie was vat-grown as a slave in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, she was taught only to cook, clean and serve her masters. For most of her childhood, she knew nothing else.

UrbworldSexSlave3.title: 도시계 성 노예
UrbworldSexSlave3.desc: Emmie was sold into sexual slavery. Having been designed to be inhumanly attractive and too weak to rebel against her masters, she was passed between dozens of owners and knew nothing of freedom.

GunKid57.title: 총의 꼬마
GunKid57.desc:
Growing up in a urbworld, NAME never had it easy. Every day was a struggle and pollution, hunger, and gangs of older kids.
In the little space he had to himself, he studied his passion - guns, combat tactics, and war history.

UrbworldSergeant87.title: 도시계 경사
UrbworldSergeant87.desc:
NAME's passion for all things militaristic kept with him all the way to adulthood.
After enrolling as a local policeman, he was soon promoted to sergeant.

FeudalLordling43.title: 봉건제 지주
FeudalLordling43.desc:
NAME grew up on a feudal world that was part of a multi-planet empire. As the son of a high lord, HE enjoyed many privileges.
HECAP learned to maneuver in the both the political landscape and in close quarters combat.

SystemLord49.title: 성계 영주
SystemLord49.desc: For NAME, ruling a country, or even a planet, was not good enough. HECAP sought to expand his influence across the system - by legal or extralegal means.

FeudalFarmBoy31.title: 봉건제 농가 아이
FeudalFarmBoy31.desc:
NAME was the son of a medieval farmer, and was expected to follow in his footsteps. He was brought up as a kind, well trained farm boy.
He lived in an unusual feudal kingdom which co-existed with a midworld society which was itself well-known for genetic manipulation.

HunterOfTheKing3.title: 왕의 사냥꾼
HunterOfTheKing3.desc:
NAME was forced to protect his colony in the name of the king after a mysterious outbreak of murderous genetically-modified wildlife.
Despite his best efforts, his kingdom was destroyed. NAME developed PTSD, a hatred of animals and a bad case of technophobia. HECAP was named for the place they found him.

SpaceFanboy24.title: 우주 덕후
SpaceFanboy24.desc: NAME dreamed of space travel. He built his own pretend spaceship from an old police box and went to see the great unknown.

Castaway19.title: 조난자
Castaway19.desc: NAME was a passenger on a routine interstellar transit. When his ship was destroyed, he lived as a castaway on an uninhabited planet for several years.

GlitterworldNerd52.title: 번화계 덕후
GlitterworldNerd52.desc:
NAME loved technology from the day HE was born. HECAP had a mechanoid companion which HE tried to modify when HE was 10.
HISCAP obsession with technology meant that HE never appreciated arts or culture.

EnergyResearcher46.title: 에너지 연구원
EnergyResearcher46.desc: NAME was working on an idea for rapid communication over long distances. HECAP made an error which destroyed HIS lab and most of the city. HECAP fled the planet to escape the authorities.

WarChild73.title: 전쟁 아이
WarChild73.desc: Mushinto's parents were drafted into a civil war in his home country. Growing up surrounded by fighting and death, he became well-accustomed to tragedy and tough as nails. His expressive side, however, never developed.

BountyHunter22.title: 현상금 사냥꾼
BountyHunter22.desc: When the civil war ended, Mushinto had to find a new way to use his fighting skills. He decided to hunt down war criminals and soon realized that he enjoyed capturing bad guys by any means necessary.

UpperUrbworlder20.title: 도시계 상류층
UpperUrbworlder20.desc: NAME had a privileged childhood on a major urbworld. Living in an apartment far above the dense poverty of the city, HE spent most of HIS time reading or drawing the cityscape he saw through HIS window.

Missionary23.title: 선교사
Missionary23.desc: NAME decided to devote HIS life to religious service. HE made a vow of peace and spent several years preaching and serving food in soup kitchens for the homeless.

IdealisticCadet35.title: 이상주의 생도
IdealisticCadet35.desc:
Raised in the military traditions of his forefathers, NAME was taught from a young age that he would be a great leader and the hero of the Dichter family.
He excelled at his studies and graduated from the academy with honors.

MercenaryPilot69.title: 용병 조종사
MercenaryPilot69.desc:
NAME convinced his squadron to abscond with their ships and make a course for the rim worlds. There they could fight for the causes they believed in.
His men were loyal and fought hard, but their ideals soon faded away and their cause became that of the highest bidder.

ChildOfGlass96.title: 온실의 아이
ChildOfGlass96.desc:
NAME was raised underground on a "marble" planet - a wasteland of radioactive asphalt and toxic fallout.
To survive on a planet devoid of life, HE had to learn how to farm underground and how to fight without wasting bullets.

LoneTraveler73.title: 고독한 여행자
LoneTraveler73.desc:
After escaping HIS homeworld on a jury-rigged ship, NAME traveled to new worlds to experience their beauty.
HECAP joined resistance groups and applied the skills HE cultivated on HIS homeworld. HECAP often warned of the nuclear horror HE saw as a child.

AmateurBotanist14.title: 아마추어 식물학자
AmateurBotanist14.desc: Spending many summers crawling through dirt, Christian found he had quite the green thumb. Instead of learning to cook the food he grew, he just grew more and more.

Undertaker50.title: 장의사
Undertaker50.desc: NAME roamed the galaxy offering grief assistance to those who've had a recent loss. While he never shied away from physical confrontation, he prefers to confront tough situations with a calm word.

ChildSlave6.title: 어린 노예
ChildSlave6.desc: Graham was born to a poor family on a rimworld. His father sold him into slavery at a young age and he was traded many times. A tycoon bought him as part of a child labor force and sent down into mines to look after machines and to work alongside them.

Mercenary75.title: 용병
Mercenary75.desc: After escaping a crew of rimworld slavers, Graham developed a lack of respect for life. He proceeded to sign on to a mercenary group where he developed skills using guns and survival techniques. Graham did dirty work where he found it, and traveled to many worlds.

AdventuringChild56.title: 모험의 아이
AdventuringChild56.desc:
Axle was raised to become an engineer. For years, he planned to stow away on a cargo ship and start a new, more adventuresome life.
One night, after his parents fell asleep, he managed to sneak on board a cargo ship just before it left port.

HiredAssassin2.title: 살인 청부업자
HiredAssassin2.desc: Axle was a master thief, working mostly for organized crime. Over time, he made a name for himself and shifted his business into the paid "removal" of human threats.

VideoGamer91.title: 비디오 게이머
VideoGamer91.desc: Ryan was raised in a glitterworld. Everything he wanted came to him. In school he was a social butterfly. At home, he spent his time looking up the newest gadgets and playing his favourite video games.

SpaceshipChef34.title: 우주선 주방장
SpaceshipChef34.desc: Ryan got a spot on a ship by becoming the ship's cook. He enjoyed cooking and helping the doctor clean wounds, but he never got used to cleaning the dishes.

DreadedBaby55.title: 염려되는 아기
DreadedBaby55.desc: NAME was found as a baby in a crashed spacecraft. According to the ship's data records, HE invented the nuclear device that powered his ship. Apparently, he also invented the sky and the hamburger, and is said to have fathered a race of tasty golden kittens.

DreadedDude3.title: 염려되는 놈
DreadedDude3.desc:
Some followers say that NAME and HIS crew of misfits found the Fountain of Youth, many, many centuries ago, and that they caused the extinction of the dinosaurs on many planets.
There's even a religion about them, somewhere, involving noodles and meatballs.

Tinkerer87.title: 땜장이
Tinkerer87.desc: NAME grew up on a scrap-heap of a planet - the garbage dump of other planets in the system. He learned to make new machines from the dead parts of old ones. With some friends, he eventually escaped on a salvaged and repaired ship.

Engineer9.title: 기술자
Engineer9.desc: NAME found a job as a tinkering engineer on the trading hub planet Irithir. Tough local traders forced him to learn negotiation skills, and he made good profits selling refurbished weapons and tools.

DisplacedNoble82.title: 추방된 귀족
DisplacedNoble82.desc: Born on an urbworld to the ruler of three megacities, NAME’s prospects looked good - until a violent insurrection overthrew HIS family. Exile introduced NAME to hard work and combat, but some high-born squeamishness remains.

Minister38.title: 장관
Minister38.desc: NAME managed to secure an important position in the government of a minor glitterworld. HECAP got used to the opulence, while attempting to keep HIS citizens content. HECAP had ample time for pleasure and indulgence – though HE never forgot how to do hard work.

ChessMaster23.title: 체스의 장인
ChessMaster23.desc:
NAME loved to play chess. HECAP even earned the nickname Bishop for some of HIS craftier moves.
HECAP never got into trouble - mostly because he was good at not getting caught.

Pirate65.title: 해적
Pirate65.desc:
As a pirate leader, Bishop was well-known for his cunning plans and chess-like traps. HECAP was never afraid to sacrifice a few pawns to capture an important target.
HISCAP name has been linked more then once to strategies that overcame overwhelming odds.

Orphan62.title: 고아
Orphan62.desc: Born on a deep space station, NAME was orphaned at a young age. In the orphanage, he stood up for the weaker kids and fought off the bullies.

BountyHunter14.title: 현상금 사냥꾼
BountyHunter14.desc: NAME is a self-employed bounty hunter. HECAP spent HIS days hunting space pirates and collecting cash bounties.

Straggler99.title: 낙오자
Straggler99.desc:
Despite being blessed with parental love, NAME hardly knew his parents.
HECAP was frequently left to his own devices which meant more time devoted to exploring his interests…and getting into trouble.

Spiceminer98.title: 향신료 광부
Spiceminer98.desc:
NAME made his mark on the universe as a spice miner assigned to the lucrative mining colony of Rural Pen’The.
Little did he know, Benn was about to embark on a career path that would change his life.

BrutalThief33.title: 잔혹한 도둑
BrutalThief33.desc:
Growing up in a gang, NAME learned the brutality of the streets.
Knowing that showing weakness could be fatal, he closed himself of to others.

CrimeLord40.title: 범죄의 제왕
CrimeLord40.desc:
Through brutality and cruelty, NAME rose to the rank of crime lord.
He relied less on his fists and more on his guns. His reputation spread faster due to his cold-bloodedness and ruthless methods.

BoySoldier18.title: 어린 군인
BoySoldier18.desc:
War may never change - but the cast of characters does.
Born on a violent urbworld, NAME was trained from a young age to fight the wars of others, and became rather good at it.

MarbleDoctor3.title: 무정한 의사
MarbleDoctor3.desc:
On a bomb-blasted world, first aid is often the only aid.
NAME used his medical skills to help the injured and the sick. HECAP believed that while guns and machines may be powerful, a doctor is even more so.

ApocalypseChild97.title: 종말의 아이
ApocalypseChild97.desc:
NAME spent his childhood on a post-apocalyptic world. He fought for survival from a young age, on a planet where trust did not exist.
He told everyone that he had no luck.

MobHenchman44.title: 조직 오른팔
MobHenchman44.desc: After being "saved" from his home world by a slaver ship, NAME was sold to an urbworld crime lord, where he was used as a henchman. He specialized in low-tech beat-downs and intimidation.

OrphanOfWar96.title: 전쟁 고아
OrphanOfWar96.desc:
NAME lost his family and home early in life. His life became emotionally hollow, but his painful memories drove him to survive.
HECAP took several jobs, but never achieved more than a basic education.

MechWarVeteran90.title: 메카 전쟁 베테랑
MechWarVeteran90.desc: NAME fought against swarms of rogue mechanoids since he was old enough to enlist. HECAP has bled on half a dozen worlds and has lost more than he cares to recall. These experiences left him hardened, both mentally and physically.

ImperialStudent92.title: 제국 학생
ImperialStudent92.desc: NAME studied on an imperial midworld where guns were banned and self-defense study was encouraged. The relative safety allowed HIM to focus on HIS botanical research.

PoisonGardener85.title: 독 정원사
PoisonGardener85.desc:
NAME spent almost all HIS time tending to a poison garden and became withdrawn from society.
In that time HE learnt a few safe culinary and medicinal uses for the otherwise deadly plants.

PowerMadScholar58.title: 힘에 미친 학자
PowerMadScholar58.desc: "Knowledge is power." These words sparked something within NAME, and came to form his core drive. When not entombed within libraries, HE would take things apart to see first-hand how they worked, with little regard for the border between mechanical and organic.

ArtificerRampant50.title: 걷잡을 수 없는 기능공
ArtificerRampant50.desc:
Fuelled by the thrill of discovery and his own megalomania, NAME set out to invent new devices and improve existing ones, breaking laws and customs as necessary.
HECAP formed a crew to gather materials for HIS work - and to deal with outsiders who might interfere.

TechHead78.title: 기술책임자
TechHead78.desc:
Standing on the ship hull with his father in an child-size EVA suit, NAME loved space from a young age.
HECAP was put in a Civil Academics Program. While pretending to be like HIS father, HE spent HIS time taking care of plants in HIS messy room. HISCAP nickname was given for HIS love of circles.

SystemsEngineer27.title: 체계 기술자
SystemsEngineer27.desc:
Like HIS father, NAME was a systems engineer. HECAP was qualified in both colony and ship systems.
When not working, HE would make mechanical figurines, read old books, or occasionally travel to uncharted worlds. Being introverted, HE did these things mostly alone.

Orphan91.title: 고아
Orphan91.desc:
Left alone in the world without parents, Kevin did the best he could to adapt.
Having to take care both of himself and younger kids at the orphanage, he learned a lot about humans and how to interact with them.

NeuroScientist84.title: 신경 과학자
NeuroScientist84.desc:
Kevin worked for a long time to improve the world's understanding of the human brain.
After succeeding in mapping the whole brain, Kevin joined a team of scientist on a quest to map the brains of xeno species.

Abductee39.title: 유괴된 꼬마
Abductee39.desc: NAME was abducted at a young age and forced to do menial labor on a pirate ship.

PirateCaptain0.title: 해적 선장
PirateCaptain0.desc: NAME worked his way up through the ranks of a pirate ship, eventually becoming captain. He leads his crew between worlds, making a name to remember.

BlackjackPlayer50.title: 블랙잭 선수
BlackjackPlayer50.desc:
The only useful skill NAME learned from his tough military school was card counting. He amassed many enemies by cheating at casinos, becoming ever more edgy and violent as the threat of retaliation grew.
When he was finally caught, they burned half his skin off. He'll never be able to face fire or violence again.

HedgeFundManager27.title: 헤지 펀드 매니저
HedgeFundManager27.desc:
A top hedge fund manager on a teeming urbworld, NAME's portfolio grew rapidly as he charmed clients with a sweet voice and devious intent. When the deal turned out too good to be true, he was forced to flee the planet with a bounty on his head.
As he travelled the stars he found a passion in the arts, making masterpieces fit for high society customers.

AcademyStudent52.title: 사관학교 학생
AcademyStudent52.desc:
NAME went to school like a good space cadet would. He was very tall and was known for his good looks.
Though he worried more about his hairstyle than his grades, he still somehow passed the final exams.

ComputerEngineer28.title: 컴퓨터 기술자
ComputerEngineer28.desc:
Bored of his code-monkey office job and missing the glory days of the Academy, NAME saw a commercial about the frontier where "only the strong survive".
With his wife Morgan, NAME undertook a journey into the unknown.

AspiringEngineer42.title: 기술자 지망생
AspiringEngineer42.desc:
NAME had a fascination with gadgets and gizmos. HECAP took apart and put together almost anything HE could find.
HECAP got used to repairing toys brought to HIM by other children, and even fixed a few devices from HIS elders.

ExpertHandyman95.title: 전문 잡역부
ExpertHandyman95.desc: NAME worked as a traveling engineer. HECAP fixed things ranging from a simple communications array to the intricate software harness in his ship's AI meta-core. Nothing is beyond repair for HIM.

MedicalStudent18.title: 의학 학생
MedicalStudent18.desc:
NAME grew up on a glitterworld in a family of doctors and chose to maintain the tradition.
HECAP had few friends, but got along with HIS siblings very well.

MedicSoldier37.title: 간호 군인
MedicSoldier37.desc:
NAME enrolled in his planetary army as a frontline medic. He soon knew the horrors of war and was deeply marked by them.
HECAP left the military and his homeworld and began researching medicine and helping those he came across.

HighBaroness49.title: 고위 남작
HighBaroness49.desc:
NAME was born as low-ranking royalty in a large imperial family.
She was placed In charge of running her home planet from an early age, and learned important political and cultural skills in that role.

ExiledResearcher36.title: 추방된 연구원
ExiledResearcher36.desc: NAME's love of robotics was not appreciated in her technophobic empire. The High Cardinal of the system excommunicated her, and she was never allowed to return.

WorldSlider50.title: 세계구 범죄자
WorldSlider50.desc: NAME was raised by a world-hopping band of criminals. HECAP learned not to leave evidence of his presence in case the group had to leave in a hurry. HECAP also learned about medicine and hand-to-hand combat from his fellow criminals.

Villain66.title: 악당
Villain66.desc: After rising to the top of his criminal band, NAME was taught the arts of villainy, from handling firearms to developing new weapons technologies. He excelled at bending others to his will.

MedicalStudent71.title: 의학 학생
MedicalStudent71.desc: Born into a long line of doctors, NAME was tutored in all fields of medicine, from herbal ointments to the modern synthetic drugs. HECAP also picked up a healthy disdain for lower class work.

SpaceNavyDoctor40.title: 우주 해군 의사
SpaceNavyDoctor40.desc: NAME served several tours as a doctor on one of the few warships defending HIS homeworld. HECAP learned combat skills while fighting occasional pirate boarding parties, and became an expert at treating gruesome combat wounds.

AspergersRebel96.title: 아스퍼거 반군
AspergersRebel96.desc:
NAME grew up as a rebel on an formerly-advanced rimworld devastated by war.
HISCAP Aspergers syndrome meant he struggled with social situations and was incapable of caring, but HE learned hard skills like research and shooting very quickly.

GovernmentAgent80.title: 정부 요원
GovernmentAgent80.desc:
NAME worked for the government against rebel groups and excelled in this capacity. During HIS training HE was taught firearms, melee combat and medical skills.
Having grown up in a war-ravaged city, dirt, blood and dead bodies don’t bother HIM and HE sees no reason to clean them up.

ShootingComa31.title: 사격의 혼수상태
ShootingComa31.desc: Nebulys fell into a coma at a young age and spent years dreaming about shooting. When he awoke, he was useless at most tasks - but he could aim pretty well.

SelflessHunter57.title: 이타적인 사냥꾼
SelflessHunter57.desc:
Nebulys was a hunter of mysterious creatures that many didn't even believe existed. Sometimes the people were right - and sometimes they were wrong.
Along the way, he helped people in need.

PsychologyStudent88.title: 심리학 학생
PsychologyStudent88.desc:
NAME researched new religions and traditions and often dreamt of distant stars.
His dreams prompted him to ask what lay beyond the lights in the sky.

AcolyteOfStars66.title: 별의 시종
