AcolyteOfStars66.desc:
Ever the dreamer, NAME traveled across the universe to find the thing he felt was calling to him.
HECAP became poorer and poorer, but used every means possible to carry on.

SpaceSmuggler10.title: 우주 밀수업자
SpaceSmuggler10.desc:
Tater's parents used him to help smuggle contraband between a cluster of rim worlds.
Aided by his small size, Tater became very adept at carrying out his parents' missions, learning weaponry, negotiations, and most of all smuggling.

SpaceRaider65.title: 우주 침략자
SpaceRaider65.desc: Tater was the leader of a spaceborne pirate crew. Skipping between the rim worlds, he became the feared enemy of many settlements.

Abductee2.title: 유괴된 꼬마
Abductee2.desc:
NAME was abducted by xenohumans when HE was still a baby. They experimented on HIM to understand his genetic structure.
As HE grew up, NAME grew a little bit too big and strong for his captors and eventually escaped.

Spy40.title: 첩보원
Spy40.desc: NAME was trained by HIS government in infiltration and espionage. HECAP learned to keep a cool head and to talk HIS way out of tight situations. When talking didn't work, HE was capable of more violent direct action.

BlessedChild86.title: 축복받은 아이
BlessedChild86.desc:
NAME was born under auspicious circumstances to a midworld spiritual group and held in reverence throughout HIS childhood.
HECAP learned to take care of the poor and give succor to the faithful from an early age.

WanderingHealer6.title: 방랑하는 치유사
WanderingHealer6.desc:
NAME studied to be a doctor, but was dissatisfied with HIS practice on an otherwise peaceful midworld.
Instead, HE chose to pull up roots and travel to the rimworlds in order to care for people who needed HIM most.

YouthSoldier99.title: 어린 군인
YouthSoldier99.desc:
NAME was born into a long line of soldiers. He followed that heritage, joining a military training program.
He excelled in all physical training programs in his Marine course, and even passed most of the intellectual exams. While he was never particularly bright or nimble, NAME learned the value of hard work and suffering.

VeteranSoldier2.title: 베테랑 군인
VeteranSoldier2.desc:
NAME fought many tours against pirates, rebels, and xenos. He endured the glory and horrors of war.
Worn down by drills, wars, and battle scars, NAME 'retired' to the easy soldier life of colonial civility enforcement. He spent his days polishing his war medals, knowing he had done his bloodline proud.

GlitterworldKid84.title: 번화계 꼬마
GlitterworldKid84.desc:
The son of a genetically-engineered "perfect mate" on a glitterworld, Chaz was much more shy, withdrawn and nervous than his parents. HECAP kept mostly to himself, studying science and medicine and taking on gardening as a hobby.
In HIS teens, HE ran away from home, seeking a quieter life.

CosmeticReject89.title: 화장품 거부자
CosmeticReject89.desc:
Living on the streets, Chaz submitted himself to an unethical cosmetics lab in exchange for food and shelter.
After some painful cosmetic modification, Chaz barely resembles his former self. Having been forced to work for the lab until he was rescued, Chaz is now too afraid to lash out at anyone.

FeralChild73.title: 야생의 아이
FeralChild73.desc:
NAME and his family lived a hard but prosperous lives along with their fellow colonists on a distant rimworld.
One day a group of mechanoids attacked, killing everyone aside from Robert. He then lived alone in the desert until a group of raiders found him.

RaiderKing70.title: 침략 왕
RaiderKing70.desc: Starting as nothing more than a slave, NAME rose quickly among the raider ranks until all knew his name and his ruthlessness.

Scout86.title: 정찰병
Scout86.desc:
Nate loved being outdoors. His parents enrolled him in a program that taught military scouting skills. He thrived when he was left alone in the wilderness.
Due to this upbringing, however, NAME did not learn the basic technological skills that are taken for granted by many others.

FrontierMarshal75.title: 국경 보안관
FrontierMarshal75.desc:
Nate was the marshal of his colony. He tried to honorably uphold the law, but the corrupt local mayor killed his family and left him for dead.
After regaining his health, Nate arrested the mayor. HECAP left his homeworld and started a new life working to make a difference in the universe.

TraineeAlchemist98.title: 수습 연금술사
TraineeAlchemist98.desc: NAME grew up on a medieval world. He learned the basics of alchemy and medicine in one the few monastic schools on his planet.

ReligiousHierarch42.title: 종교 고관
ReligiousHierarch42.desc:
Ordained as a priest in his local community, NAME used intrigue and diplomacy to rise to the higher echelon of the clergy. He held numerous titles and lands.
One day, a merchant landed his spaceship near NAME's home. HECAP decided to accompany the merchant in search for new worlds and challenges.

Pickpocket96.title: 소매치기
Pickpocket96.desc: NAME witnessed HIS parents' murder at a young age. With no guidance, HE had to fend for HIMself any way possible. Joining a small group of misfits HE did whatever was necessary to survive.

CriminalSurgeon8.title: 범죄의 외과의
CriminalSurgeon8.desc:
Being near many injured fellow criminals, NAME took it upon HIMself to work on them.
Although many people died, HE did get better at using knives.

SpaceCadet12.title: 우주 생도
SpaceCadet12.desc:
Growing up on a rural farm-world leaves little opportunity for excitement and adventure, so when the Royal Fleet began a recruiting program on his home planet, Jake threw down his hoe and cattle prod to took up arms for the crown.
He served on the interplanetary super-destroyer HMS Thunder-Child.

SanitationCaptain28.title: 관리소장
SanitationCaptain28.desc:
After graduating officer training school, Jake was assigned to main battle deck on the Thunder-Child. He served there for a year before his "gallant" actions saw him reassigned to the maintenance corps.
It was with the maintenance corps he was dubbed Table on account of his legs.

Naturalist25.title: 박제사
Naturalist25.desc:
Mitch grew up on a backwater planet with minimal education. He had to hunt and grow food to survive.
HISCAP family's home was frequently raided for food by scavengers. This made Mitch very suspicious and slow to trust anyone he doesn't know.

OverwatchSniper73.title: 엄호 저격수
OverwatchSniper73.desc:
NAME didn't know why he joined the military, but he stayed to protect his fellow soldiers.
Army life broke him down and built him back up. It taught him marksmanship, hand to hand combat and how to patch a bullet wound in a hurry.

Drudge47.title: 잉여
Drudge47.desc:
NAME was never sure what HE wanted to do with HIS life. HECAP spent most of HIS time doing low-wage jobs and wondering what HIS future would be like.
HECAP entertained himself with space sims and survival games, dreaming of one day being somewhere more interesting.

GalacticSightseer55.title: 은하계 관광객
GalacticSightseer55.desc:
NAME traveled the stars. HECAP could barely scrape together travel costs doing odd-jobs on stations, but it was all worth it. Seeing the wonders of the galaxy was where HE found HIS calling.
HECAP loved camping on exotic worlds and learning the patterns of strange wildlife. The wonders of the universe inspired HIM like nothing else could.

ChildOfDrifters15.title: 유랑자의 아이
ChildOfDrifters15.desc: Ever since HE was very small, NAME had never known a home beyond HIS parent's ship. They were a family of nomads whose meandering provided a constant change of scenery. HISCAP life was often perilous but never dull, and HE inherited HIS parents' wanderlust at a young age.

WanderingCrafter28.title: 방랑하는 제작자
WanderingCrafter28.desc: NAME continued to follow HIS parents' nomadic ways, supporting himself with his crafting skills. But wandering is a hard life, and HE often thought of finding somewhere to settle down and put HIS skills to good use.

TribalThunderer25.title: 부족의 수호자
TribalThunderer25.desc: Years ago, NAME's tribe stumbled upon an abandoned gun vault. Believing the weapons to be sacred gifts, the shaman would select a child born under superstitious circumstances and assign them the honour of bearing one to defend the village. NAME is such a child.

MutinousCaptain49.title: 반란의 선장
MutinousCaptain49.desc:
NAME was taken to the stars by slavers after HIS tribe was decimated in a raid. Over the years HE learned the language of HIS captors, eventually working for them as an interpreter and diplomat.
The captain only learned of NAME's true cunning when revenge was taken by form of mutiny.

CorpBredStudent62.title: 승계 수업생
CorpBredStudent62.desc:
NAME was bred to become an executive for the space exploration corporation that owned his home planet. HISCAP family had been working for that corporation for four generations.
At age five, HE enrolled at the corporate academy where he learned loyalty and ruthlessness. NAME excelled in finding diplomatic solutions where others would need violence.

CorpResearcher37.title: 회사 연구원
CorpResearcher37.desc: NAME was a leading researcher for a massive space exploration corporation.

EarthColonist29.title: 지구 개척자
EarthColonist29.desc: NAME was born on Earth. As a child, HECAP was launched into space as part of an interstellar colonization program.

SoleSurvivor46.title: 유일한 생존자
SoleSurvivor46.desc: NAME lived in a remote colony. When mechanoid centipedes attacked his home and killed his people, he was the last survivor.

MilitaryTrainee74.title: 군대 훈련생
MilitaryTrainee74.desc: NAME was raised on a military base in the Xennoa system. HECAP was exposed to many different strenuous activities and grew strong at an early age. HECAP also learned negotiation, medical, and military tactics.

AWOLSoldier54.title: 탈영병
AWOLSoldier54.desc:
NAME was an infantryman.
When HECAP was informed of his assignment to the Xennoa-Zartza War, HECAP decided he did not want to be a soldier. He was able to escape via military spacejet.

Bookworm75.title: 책벌레
Bookworm75.desc: NAME spent his youth in the library, reading every book he could about the technical marvels of space travel, the engineering ingenuity of the space-faring pioneers, and the horrible yet fascinating tales of the mechanoid races. He vowed that one day, he would see these things for himself.

Explorer36.title: 탐험가
Explorer36.desc: NAME traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. He hoped one day to compile a record of every animal, plant, mineral, and machine and device in known space: The Complete Traveler's Guide to the RimWorlds.

ColonyKid89.title: 식민지 꼬마
ColonyKid89.desc:
NAME was born the child of two doctors in a small colony. Because of HIS parents, HE was always interested in science and medicine.
NAME never really got along with other children, and as a result became withdrawn and unsociable.

StarshipDoctor78.title: 우주선 의사
StarshipDoctor78.desc: NAME was a doctor on a starship. He was a brilliant surgeon and dabbled in research of his own. However, he was quite reclusive and never had the best bedside manner.

CaravanChild53.title: 행상단 아이
CaravanChild53.desc:
NAME was born on a urbworld merchant ship to an entrepreneurial mother and an absent father. Born male, she disliked boy stuff, and got into her mother’s things all the time.
Eventually, she traveled with her mother to a glitterworld and spent her savings on a body she was happy with.

BountyHunter28.title: 현상금 사냥꾼
BountyHunter28.desc: NAME was a bounty hunter on a massive glitterworld. HECAP worked sensitive assignments for extremely wealthy clients, and was known for quiet execution and total discretion.

ReEducatedYouth32.title: 재교육된 청소년
ReEducatedYouth32.desc:
NAME lived on a midworld where the government cared about the youth.
HECAP was one of the many children who were taken from their parents and forced into the new education programs.

FallenOfficial20.title: 탐관오리
FallenOfficial20.desc:
NAME was an official for an autocratic government.
When HIS superiors demanded HE participate in atrocities, NAME resigned and escape from his homeworld with nothing but the clothes on HIS back.

AccursedChild43.title: 저주받은 아이
AccursedChild43.desc:
NAME was born at the peak of a lunar eclipse. The elders declared HIM a child of darkness brought HIM under their care.
HISCAP entire childhood was spent studying the lore and rituals of HIS people - until the day of calling.

ShamanOfShadows30.title: 그림자의 주술사
ShamanOfShadows30.desc:
When the monsters of fire came from the sky, NAME was called upon by HIS tribe to guide them into battle.
NAME made use of medicines and rituals to inspire and lead the warriors of many tribes against the invaders. The pirates were forced to retreat without capturing a single slave.

AmateurAstronomer76.title: 아마추어 천문학자
AmateurAstronomer76.desc:
NAME was fascinated with astronomy. HECAP would spend hours gazing at planets and nebulae through his telescope.
HECAP is credited with discovering a small comet that would, years later, strike a nearby moon and disrupt the mining operations there.

StationSecurity1.title: 정거장 경비원
StationSecurity1.desc:
NAME was commissioned as a special constable on a network of space stations. There he prevented illegal human trafficking.
Once, fire broke out on the station, and HE saved many from the flames. Since then, HE has avoided fires.

FarmHand94.title: 농가 일꾼
FarmHand94.desc:
NAME was born on a farm on a smaller colony world.
Everything was taken care of by the few members of the farm, including NAME. This helped HIM build independence, spirit, and a well-rounded character.

SpaceTrafficker87.title: 우주 밀매상
SpaceTrafficker87.desc:
NAME discovered HE was heir of HIS distant uncle's weapons-trading business.
To protect the future of the company HE went through extensive military training, in case of any "unforeseen circumstances".

EnergeticPopIdol4.title: 활동적인 아이돌
EnergeticPopIdol4.desc:
Priscilla grew up on a glitterworld, training in rapier arts and singing. She spent several years as an energetic teen pop idol.
However, she decided that the music and modeling industries were not paying her enough attention, so she left.

PopIdolPirate25.title: 아이돌 해적
PopIdolPirate25.desc:
NAME and her fans set out as a space pirate crew. She raided corporations for money and staged performances to spread her name.
NAME became afraid of fire when a rival burned her stage down. She relied on her fans to do the work she found unappealing.

IcePlanetChild56.title: 얼음 행성 아이
IcePlanetChild56.desc:
Growing up on the frozen wastes of an ocean moon, NAME only had animals and a few hard-bitten sailors as companions.
The lack of social interaction made him develop a interest in engineering - but he never developed any great fondness for humans.

Roboticist87.title: 로봇 기술자
Roboticist87.desc:
Sailors often died on the dangerous waters of NAME's ocean planet. HECAP created robots to replace them.
Over time, he collected a small crew of robots to do his bidding. HECAP became proficient at mechanics and engineering, but lost the taste for manual labor.

ToxicChild59.title: 중독된 아이
ToxicChild59.desc:
Growing up on a an Industrial planet, NAME started working in a chemical plant at age of six. Years of exposure to industrial toxins left him mentally scarred.
He eventually blew up the facility and escaped the planet in a stolen cargo ship.

StalwartFarmer91.title: 충실한 농부
StalwartFarmer91.desc:
With the farm under constant threat from brigands, NAME learned to defend himself with his father's rifle. HECAP also mastered how to construct walls to keep livestock in and predators out.
He once tried to paint a picture of his home, but discovered that he could only draw scribbles and ducks.

BoyScout19.title: 보이 스카우트
BoyScout19.desc:
NAME was in a boy scout troop on a midworld.
He learned many survival skills including how to thrive in the outdoors and how to tend to basic wounds.

UrbworldPimp46.title: 도시계 포주
UrbworldPimp46.desc: 처음에 NAME(은)는 약을 팔아서 작은 이익을 좀 봤습니다. 그리고 HE 여자를 팔아 부를 쌓았습니다. HE 특이하게 두 주먹으로 훌륭한 기술을 배웠습니다. 여자들을 때리며 괴롭힌 덕에 상처를 치료하는 법을 배우게 됐습니다.

ScienceProdigy96.title: 과학 영재
ScienceProdigy96.desc: NAME(은)는 학교에서 화학, 물리학, 우주 생물학, 천문학, 오페라까지 최고의 성적을 냈습니다. 다만 불행하게도 과학 실험 중 사고로 인해 불을 무서워하게 됐습니다.

ParticlePhysicist6.title: 입자 물리학자
ParticlePhysicist6.desc: NAME(은)는 최첨단 물리학 연구를 했습니다. 그녀는 더욱 아름답고 평화로운 미래를 꿈꿔왔습니다.

DefenseLawyer2.title: 피고측 변호사
DefenseLawyer2.desc: NAME(은)는 총보다 빠른 말솜씨로 돈을 버는 재능이 있었습니다. 일자리를 찾을 때도 HIS 언변은 유용했고, 결국 법조계로 전환했습니다. HE 종종 동네 친구들을 보호하기 위해 초고속 레이서들을 변호했습니다.

SpeederRacer68.title: 초고속 레이서
SpeederRacer68.desc: NAME(은)는 칼데리아에 있는 숲에서 양치 식물을 키우는 농부의 아들로 태어났습니다. HE 대형 캐너피와 화려한 풍경 사이를 초고속으로 가로지르는 레이싱에 깊은 흥미를 느꼈습니다. 이 지하세계의 경주 덕택에 빠르게 말을 하거나 총을 쓰는 방법을 배웠습니다.

MercenaryRecruit61.title: 용병 신입
MercenaryRecruit61.desc:
외지의 용병집단에서 태어난 NAME(은)는 상당히 정신없는 무역 허브에서 자랐습니다.
결국 HECAP가 젊은 나이일 때 용병단원에 가담했습니다.

Ranger8.title: 레인저
Ranger8.desc:
NAME(은)는 숲 속 깊은 곳에서 혼자 자랐습니다.
HE 야생에서 밀렵꾼에게 대항하여 몸을 지켰고, 바깥의 도움 없이도 필요한 물자를 스스로 조달할 수 있게 됐습니다.

MarineCadet8.title: 해병 생도
MarineCadet8.desc:
NAME was in a planetary marine cadet program.
HECAP was kicked out for shooting an officer. It was never established whether this was an accident.

ClanChief70.title: 클랜 요리사
ClanChief70.desc: NAME managed a small criminal clan on an outlying trade hub world.

YoungPsychologist60.title: 어린 심리학자
YoungPsychologist60.desc:
NAME(은)는 가난한 중간계에서 태어나고 자랐습니다. HIS 어머니가 소유하고 있던 택시의 조수석에 있곤 했습니다.
지나다니는 사람을 보고 택시 승객의 잡담을 하루종일 듣다 보니 HE 누군가의 진짜 의도를 알아차리는 재능이 생겼습니다.

FactionLeader69.title: 조직 두목
FactionLeader69.desc:
HECAP가 어른이 되기 전에 NAME은(는) 범죄 소굴에 있었습니다.
그냥 재미로 그 자들을 죽음으로 몰아넣게 만들자 HE 리더십에 대한 야망과 함께 재능이 있다는 것을 깨달았습니다.

LabGrownChild20.title: 실험실에서 자란 아이
LabGrownChild20.desc:
NAME(은)는 새로운 인류를 만들기 위한 욕심에 실험실에서 태어났지만 결국 그 프로젝트는 실패하고 말았습니다.
HISCAP 어린시절은 무수한 서적과 1:1 주입식 교육 뿐이었습니다. HE 인간의 진정한 본성에 어색함을 느끼고, 부끄러웠으며 불편했습니다.

CorpResearcher9.title: 회사 연구원
CorpResearcher9.desc:
NAME(은)는 과학 연구를 하는 일노예로써 한 기업에 팔려나갔습니다.
HE 직장에서 사회적으로 적응을 할 수 없었기에 일에만 매달렸고, 그것은 승진으로 이어질 수 없었습니다. 매일 HE 혼자서 일하고 싶었습니다.

TechScholar7.title: 기술 학자
TechScholar7.desc:
NAME(은)는 전 세계의 과학과 기술에 관여하는 젊은 학자였습니다.
HE 매일 매일 자신의 지식을 갈고닦기위해 노력했습니다.

TechnologyDoctor90.title: 기술 박사
TechnologyDoctor90.desc:
NAME(은)는 추진 연료와 에너지 생성에 대한 연구를 진행했습니다.
HE 기술 연구를 정말 좋아했고, 이를 통해 인간의 삶이 더욱 윤택해지길 소망했습니다.

PitGladiator18.title: 투기장 검투사
PitGladiator18.desc: NAME(은)는 어린 시절부터 지하 세계의 투기장에서 괴물이나 다른 사람들과 싸우도록 키워진 노예였습니다. HE 스포츠에 타고남을 보여줬기에 마침내 자유를 쟁취할 수 있게 됐습니다. 하지만 많은 경험에도 불구하고 그 구덩이에 있으면서 지적인 경험은 전혀 만나볼 수 없었습니다.

PirateTrooper88.title: 해적 병사
PirateTrooper88.desc: NAME(은)는 유명한 성간 범죄조직에 들어갔습니다. 그 다음 HE 우주선 강탈 작전에서 충격침투조의 일원으로 활동하곤 했습니다. HIS 전투 경험이 훌륭한 전사로 만들어 줬음에도 불구하고, 무자비했던 이 직업은 결국 다른 사람이 HIM 보기에 차갑고 냉담한 사람으로 보이게끔 만들어 버렸습니다.

FactoryWorker58.title: 공장 노동자
FactoryWorker58.desc:
NAME(은)는 산업계의 도시에 있는 거대한 공장에서 자랐습니다.
HE 겉잡을 수 없는 식량난과 빈곤 속에서 임금을 얻기 위해 일했습니다. 그에겐 쉬운 생활이 아니었지만 NAME(은)는 힘든 하루 일을 절대로 쉬는 일이 없었습니다.

CombatMedic16.title: 전투 간호병
CombatMedic16.desc:
HIS 고향이 어마어마한 전쟁에 휘말린 이후 NAME(은)는 군의 전투 간호병으로 징집됐습니다.
몇 년동안을 참호속에서 동료 병사를 살려내려 했고, 그것은 응급치료 감각을 잘 발달시키게 해줬습니다. 또한 HE 친구들을 잃어가면서 금욕과 금주 생활이 몸에 베이게 됐습니다.

RichBoy51.title: 부유한 아이
RichBoy51.desc: NAME(은)는 중세계에서 부모님의 사랑을 받고 자랐습니다. 귀여운 애완동물과 많은 돈과 함께 말이죠. 그러나 친구는 없었습니다. HE 항상 아버지에게 이렇게 말하곤 했습니다. '저 농부들은 아버지께 돈만 달라는 말 밖에 못하네요.' 그래서 HE 대부분의 시간을 혼자 보냈습니다. 그렇지 않은 시간엔 다른 꼬마들과 싸움을 벌이곤 했죠.

HiredGun99.title: 청부업자
HiredGun99.desc: NAME(은)는 늘 부모의 도움 없이 살 수 있다는 것을 증명하고 싶었습니다. HECAP는 죄 없는 사람에게 총을 겨누는 어둠의 직업을 가지고 있었죠. 어느 날 약간의 돈을 모아 값싼 화물선에 탈 수 있게 되었습니다. 그러나 그는 곧 추락했고, 왜 그 화물선이 값싼 화물선인지 알게 되었습니다.

Athlete75.title: 운동선수
Athlete75.desc: NAME(은)는 이른 나이부터 프로 운동선수 출신이었습니다. 그러한 능력 덕에 그녀는 고향별에서 떠나 번화계에 있는 과학기술 대학교에 입학할 수 있게 되었습니다. 그러나 살인적인 스케쥴과 천성적인 내성적 성격으로 인해 그녀는 사회적으로 서투른 사람이 되었습니다.

StilettoAssassin10.title: 단검 암살자
StilettoAssassin10.desc: 그녀의 능력은 자신을 우월감에 빠지게 만들었습니다. 시간이 흘러 그녀는 점점 공감 능력을 상실하게 되었고 잦은 싸움을 벌이게 되었습니다. 그 싸움으로 인해 사람을 죽이기 얼마나 쉬웠는지 알게 되었죠. 사람을 죽이는 재능을 깨닫자 그녀는 자신의 행성계에서 가장 뛰어난 암살자가 되었습니다.

SoleSurvivor99.title: 유일한 생존자
SoleSurvivor99.desc: NAME의 부족은 알 수 없는 질병으로 몰살당했습니다. 이후에 그는 홀로 발견되었고 다른 연합에 발견되어 합류하게 되었습니다. 하지만 그는 언제 죽을지 모를 다른 부족의 구성원을 믿지 않았습니다. 차라리 그는 멀리 떨어진 곳에서 집을 짓고 나무를 베며 동물과 어울리는 것이 좋았습니다.

Hunter7.title: 사냥꾼
Hunter7.desc: NAME(은)는 최고의 사냥꾼이었습니다. 그는 엄청나게 위험한 곳에서도 동물을 추적하고 사냥하곤 했습니다. 그러한 지식들이 거대한 동물들까지 잡을 수 있는 천재적인 노하우를 얻을 수 있게 되었습니다.

MechanoidHacker35.title: 메카노이드 해커
MechanoidHacker35.desc: 존경받는 메카노이드 발명가의 유일한 아들로써 NAME(은)는 아버지가 만든 창조물들을 수정하고 바꿔놓을 수 있었습니다. 그러나 HECAP는 스스로 효율을 높이기 위해 마약을 사용했습니다. 그 부작용으로 인해 끊임없이 모든 것을 기계화하려는 망상에 빠져버리게 되었습니다. 그것은 결국 사회 생활에 영향을 끼쳤습니다.

BattlefieldTech63.title: 전장의 기술자
BattlefieldTech63.desc: NAME(은)는 총기 훈련을 받았지만 전장에서 전투용 메카노이드를 조작하는 것 같은 기술적인 일을 더 많이 하게되었습니다. HECAP는 어느 날 밀밭길에서 고전적인 화염 폭탄 공격을 받고 겨우 탈출했지만 그로 인해 트라우마가 생겨버렸습니다. 결국 그는 의병 전역을 하게 되었습니다.

ProjectSubject48.title: 프로젝트 피실험자
ProjectSubject48.desc: NAME(은)는 정부에서 주관하는 "프레임 프로젝트"라는 알 수 없는 내용의 실험자로 발탁됐습니다. 그런데 기억 차단술에 의해 그는 이 프로젝트에서 기억나는 것이 거의 없었습니다. 유일하게 알 수 있었던 것은 생존자가 극히 적었다는 것입니다.

MasterTrader3.title: 상업 장인
MasterTrader3.desc: NAME(은)는 대단한 거상이었습니다. 그러한 명성은 오랜 세월동안 한 마을에서 일을 하여 얻을 수 있게 되었습니다.

HexCellArtist19.title: 헥스셀 예술가
HexCellArtist19.desc: NAME(은)는 먹고살기 위해서 헥스셀 조각품을 만들어 지역 박물관에 그것을 팔아 살고 있었습니다. 그런데 그의 명성이 조금씩 커지자 어느 날 해적들이 그를 납치 해버렸습니다. 그 후는 해적들의 죄수로서 강제로 조각품을 만들어 팔게끔 하였습니다.

ExoticChef84.title: 이국적인 주방장
ExoticChef84.desc: NAME(은)는 새로운 음식을 만들기 위해 늘 배 밖으로 뛰쳐나왔습니다. 그리고 새롭고 이국적인 재료를 찾아다녔습니다. HISCAP 재료를 위한 목표가 지역에 있는 동식물과 더욱 가까워질 수 있게 되었습니다.

PlagueProdigy12.title: 전염병 영재
PlagueProdigy12.desc: NAME의 어린 시절은 이상한 전염병이 고향별에 퍼져버려 그리 길지 못했습니다. HECAP의 친구들이 죽는 것을 보면서 인류에 대한 동정심조차 사라지게 만들었습니다. 그리고 사라진 그 자리에는 지식에 대한 갈망이 새롭게 생겨나게 되었습니다.

MadScientist79.title: 미친 과학자
MadScientist79.desc: NAME의 지식에 대한 욕망은 누군가 자신의 연구길을 따라 연구하는 모든 사람들을 업신여길 때 생겨났습니다. 세계를 돌아다니며 그는 감히 질문할 수 없는 물음에 대한 답을 찾으려 노력했습니다.

PoorKid76.title: 가난한 아이
PoorKid76.desc: Abandoned by his parents, NAME learned how to survive by himself before he was ten years old.

Warrior43.title: 전사
Warrior43.desc: NAME was a war hero during HIS planet's third world war. HECAP helped prevent the launch of nuclear weapons during a particularly tense standoff.

Dreamer11.title: 몽상가
Dreamer11.desc: NAME(은)는 표현력이 강한 아이였습니다. HECAP는 자주 노래를 불렀고 남녀노소 할 것 없이 쉽게 친구를 사귀었습니다. HECAP는 싸움은 싫었지만 다혈질인 성격 탓에 위험에 빠지는 일이 생길 때는 화가 치밀었습니다.

SpaceExplorer81.title: 우주 탐험가
SpaceExplorer81.desc: NAME(은)는 10년 동안이나 외계 행성에서 홀로 남겨졌습니다. HECAP는 빠르게 주변 환경에 적응했고 그 지역에 있는 적들과 소통하는 방법을 배우게 되었습니다. 가까운 친구 없이 이렇게 오랜 기간 남겨지게 되자 HISCAP 심장은 더욱 예민해졌습니다. 그것은 결국 다른 사람에게 감정을 잘 숨길 수 있는 방법을 터득하게 되었습니다.

UrbworldUrchin13.title: 도시계 부랑아
UrbworldUrchin13.desc: NAME(은)는 고향별의 도심에 있는 가장 암울한 빈민가에서 태어났습니다. HECAP는 어머니에게 방치된 채로 스스로 살아남아야 했습니다. 매일 매일 식량을 모으기 위해 고철을 수집하는 고생을 해야 했죠. 결국 HECAP의 재능은 주변 사람들보다 부각되었고 어머니를 버려둔 채 이 깊은 암흑에서 표면으로 올라올 수 있게 되었습니다.

Smuggler62.title: 밀수업자
Smuggler62.desc: 계약된 파일럿인 NAME(은)는 수하물을 빼돌리고 밀수품을 몰래 수송하는 일에 재주가 있었습니다. HECAP는 그렇게 돈을 모아 개인 우주선을 구매할 수 있을 정도가 되었고, 결국 그 우주선을 타고 다른 세계를 넘나들며 무역을 시작했습니다.

MilitaryRecruit62.title: 군대 신병
MilitaryRecruit62.desc: NAME(은)는 독재가 심한 군국주의 국가인 한 중세계에서 태어났습니다. 어린 나이부터 HE 괜찮은 군인으로 훈련받았는데, 주로 총을 사용하는 법과 근접전에 대해서 훈련을 받게 되었습니다.

DestroyerGeneral40.title: 구축함 장군
DestroyerGeneral40.desc: NAME(은)는 중세계 군에서 구축함 장군이었습니다. HECAP는 무기를 잘 다룰 수 있고 배를 조종하는데 탁월한 것으로 이름을 날렸습니다.

StreetUrchin51.title: 길바닥 부랑아
StreetUrchin51.desc: 한 도시계의 가난한 가정에서 태어난 NAME(은)는 어린 나이에 길거리로 내몰렸습니다. HE 자비없는 거리에서 살아남기 위해서 물건을 훔치고 다른 사람을 죽이는 법을 터득해야만 했습니다. 그것은 근접전을 능숙하게 만들고 사격 솜씨를 좋게 만들었죠. 하지만 HE 일생에서 다른 사람과 대화를 나눌 시간은 거의 없었습니다.

SerialMurderer52.title: 연쇄 살인범
SerialMurderer52.desc: NAME(은)는 사람을 죽이는 것이 즐거워지기 시작했습니다. 그럴 수록 살인 방법은 더 교묘해졌죠. 으슥한 골목에서 사냥감을 포착하기라도 하면 몇시간이고 희생자를 추적했습니다. HE 희생자들에게 흔적을 남기는 것을 즐겼는데 자신이 죽인 사람들의 시신에 이니셜을 남기는 것으로 유명했습니다.

KidScientist80.title: 어린 과학자
KidScientist80.desc: 영향력 있는 가족에서 태어나 NAME(은)는 사교육비 걱정없이 최고의 교육을 받으며 자랐습니다. NAME의 지성은 다른 사람보다 우월하다는 것이 증명되었죠. 다만 다른 이들과의 공감 능력이 결여되어서 NAME의 선생님이나 부모님과의 마찰이 자주 있었습니다.

MadScientist65.title: 미친 과학자
MadScientist65.desc: NAME(은)는 교육과정을 마친 직후 행성급으로 이름있는 유전 연구원으로 취업했습니다. 나중에 NAME(은)는 비 인간적이고 불법적인 실험에 참여하게 되었습니다. 결국 가족의 노력에도 불구하고 유죄 판결을 받게 되었고 형별 식민지에서 강제 노역을 선고받게 되었습니다.

MedievalThief74.title: 중세 도둑
MedievalThief74.desc: NAME(은)는 중세 행성에서 가난하고 배고픔을 견디며 자랐습니다. 어느 날 HE 정말로 필요한 물건을 슬쩍했습니다. 하지만 곧 그것은 원하는 것을 얻을 만큼 노하우를 쌓게 되었습니다.

HumanTrafficker69.title: 인신 매매상
HumanTrafficker69.desc: NAME(은)는 관심이 많은 구매자들에게 집에서 납치한 아이들을 거래했습니다. 시간이 지나서 HE 결국 도덕적인 감각을 조금 잃어버리고 말았습니다.

TraumatizedYouth62.title: 충격받은 청소년
TraumatizedYouth62.desc: NAME(은)는 중세계에서 꽤나 풍요롭게 살았습니다. HISCAP 신체 개조를 당한 어머니는 심장 질환으로 아팠었는데 NAME의 아버지는 어머니를 살리기 위해 최후의 수단으로 죄 없는 사람들을 납치해서 심장을 적출하였습니다. NAME의 아버지는 결국 체포되었는데 이 사실을 모두 알게 된 NAME(은)는 씻을 수 없는 상처를 받게 되었습니다.

MentalPatient64.title: 정신병 환자
MentalPatient64.desc: NAME(은)는 정신 병원에 입원해 있었습니다. 그러나 HE 그 곳에서 명상을 하며 평온하게 시간을 보냈습니다. HECAP는 결국 석방될 수 있었는데 인간과의 감정적인 괴리감, 신체 해부에 대한 호기심, 자신과 닮은 것에 대한 광적인 태도는 그대로 남아 있었습니다.

YouthSoldier75.title: 소년군r
YouthSoldier75.desc:
Born to a long line of soldiers, NAME joined a military training program.
HECAP excelled in physical training, and even passed most of the intellectual exams. While HE was never particularly bright or nimble, NAME learned the value of hard work and suffering.

SpaceMarine48.title: 우주해병
SpaceMarine48.desc:
NAME was a warrior in an Imperial navy.
HISCAP job was to punch into enemy starships, gun down the crew, and capture the ship intact. And HE was good at it.

GalacticPage15.title: 은하계 시종
GalacticPage15.desc: NAME(은)는 우주 함대에서 총독을 따르고 있었습니다. HECAP는 거기서 상관을 대하는 말투와 태도에 대해서 배울 수 있게 되었습니다. 봉건 시대적인 HIS 사회에서는 명성을 가진 사람을 따르는 것 자체가 큰 영광이었습니다.

EnvoyOfTheStars91.title: 별의 특사
EnvoyOfTheStars91.desc: NAME(은)는 외교 연합에 입사했습니다. 모든 임무에서 명예와 전통을 가치있게 여겼죠. HISCAP 권위적인 자리는 육체 노동에서 멀어지게 만들었습니다. 대신 HIM 말로 표현하는 일에 대해서 집중하게 만들었죠. 또 그가 가진 대장장이직을 다른 사람에게 양도했습니다.

ApprenticeSmith9.title: 수습 대장장이
ApprenticeSmith9.desc: NAME(은)는 아버지가 운영하는 대장간 일을 도우며 자랐습니다. 그들은 전통적인 방식을 고수하는 행성에서 유일한 대장장이들이었죠. 심지어 몇몇 재료들을 직접 공수하기까지 했습니다. 어떤 때는 작업이 끝난 후 남는 시간을 활용하여 스스로 제련한 검으로 검술을 연습하기도 했습니다.

Blacksmith32.title: 대장장이
Blacksmith32.desc: NAME(은)는 중세계의 대장장이로써 고춤질 제작품을 만들어 명성을 쌓았습니다. 또한 일을 하면서 검을 사용하는 것도 게을리 하지 않았습니다.

CloneFarmed43.title: 복제 인간
CloneFarmed43.desc: 복제된 아이들은 시뮬레이션된 세계 속에서 빠른 속도로 성장할 수 있습니다. 인공 장기 주머니에 배양된 채 말이죠. 그들은 때때로 음식을 위해, 다른 장기를 위해, 노동을 위해 수확됩니다. 그런 자들을 보며 사람들은 늘 '일회용'이라고 불렀습니다.

CloneFarmer72.title: 복제 농부
CloneFarmer72.desc: 복제 농장에서 제품을 수확하는 일은 대개 복제된 사람들이 맡아서 하게 됩니다. 복제자들이 사회적인 감정을 가졌을 경우에 특이한 일이 발생하는데 이 복제품이 그렇습니다. 이 자는 농장에서 나와 다른 별을 향해 탈출하는 자 중 하나입니다.

GangMember12.title: 조직원
GangMember12.desc: NAME(은)는 부모가 없이 자랐습니다. HISCAP 대부분 삶은 혼자였고, 길거리에서 생존을 위해 싸우며 살았습니다. HE에게 생존은 별로 어려운 것이 아니었고, 포기도 하지 않았습니다.

GangBoss0.title: 조직 두목
GangBoss0.desc: 생존을 위해서 NAME(은)는 성간 무역선을 약탈하여 식량과 보급품을 챙겼습니다. 그래서 때때로 HE는 보안 요원들을 죽여야 할 때도 있었습니다. 어쩔 때는 체포하러 접근하는 경찰들을 죽여야 할 때도 있었죠. 결국 몇 년이 지나자 지역 행성에 있는 제국에서 가장 촉망받는 범죄자가 되어 있었습니다.

MilitantChild30.title: 전투적인 아이
MilitantChild30.desc: NAME(은)는 군인 집안에서 맨손 전투 및 교전 전술에 대해서 강제로 훈련받게 되었습니다. 어쩔때는 작은 발명품을 스스로 만들어 내기도 했는데 이것이 그를 신경질적이게 만들었습니다.

LostMarine68.title: 사라진 해병
LostMarine68.desc: HE가 살던 행성의 군에서 존경받는 위치까지 승급한지 얼마 되지도 않아서 NAME(은)는 흔적조차 남기지 않고 사라졌습니다. 나중에 HE는 자신이 관리하던 군부대에서 다시 나타났는데, 그 누구도 HE에게 무슨 일이 일어난 것인지 알지 못햇습니다.

Killer70.title: 살인자
Killer70.desc: NAME(은)는 살인 충동이 일어나는 꼬마였습니다. 마을 사람들은 심지어 HIM 사악한 뱀 사탄과 인간이 낳은 자식이라고 말했죠. HISCAP 아버지가 어머니를 배신하고 살해하는 것을 목격한 이후로 HE는 자신의 손에 얼마나 많은 사람들의 피를 볼 수 있는지를 갈망하기 시작했습니다.

Healer46.title: 치유사
Healer46.desc: NAME(은)는 세상의 아름다움을 감탄하며 시간을 보내곤 했습니다. 공격적인 성향이 잠깐씩 드러나곤 했지만 변화된 삶에 적응하기 위해 노력했습니다.

ProfessionalGamer86.title: 프로게이머
ProfessionalGamer86.desc: NAME(은)는 이제 막 조이스틱을 쥘 수 있을만큼 성장했을 때부터 비디오 게임에 사로잡혔습니다. HECAP는 16비트 게임기 시절 몇몇 지역에서 열리는 토너먼트에서 중위권을 달성했습니다. 그러나 그가 10대 초반에 일찍 은퇴하면서 아무도 그 사실을 알지 못했습니다.

ToasterRepairman81.title: 토스터 수리공
ToasterRepairman81.desc: NAME(은)는 자신의 손과 기술에 열정을 가지고 있었습니다. 자신의 고향별을 바꿀 수 있는 작은 기계 부속품이나 발명품을 연구했었죠. 하시만 몇 차례나 실패하고 때로는 비참한 결과를 맞이하게 되자 자신의 재능에 더 맞는 다른 직업을 가지게 되었습니다.

DataDecoder25.title: 데이터 해독가
DataDecoder25.desc: 번화계에서 태어난 NAME(은)는 정보를 문서화 하는 것에 대해서 많은 관심이 있었습니다. 그래서 꽤 이른 나이에 수석 번화계 위키 기록관이 될 수 있었습니다. HECAP는 혼자 공부하는 데는 소질이 있었지만 사회적인 경험은 부족했습니다.

ArchotechSpy14.title: 아코테크 첩자
ArchotechSpy14.desc: NAME(은)는 인공지능 연구원입니다. 불가능한 범위의 넓은 세상을 연구하면서 HE는 그 연구 과제에 과몰입 되었습니다. 시간이 지나면서 아코테크 기계 코어는 HE를 스파이로 사용하기 위해 고용했습니다. 하지만 나중에 HE가 비인간인 기계 주인에게 대항했을 때 그것은 HE를 저격하기 위해 우주를 가로질러 메카노이드를 보냈습니다.

WolfPackMember79.title: 늑대 무리원
WolfPackMember79.desc: NAME(은)는 자신의 가족에게 버림 받았습니다. 그리고 늑대들에게 길러지게 됩니다. HE는 달리고, 사냥하고, 자신을 보호했습니다. 그러면서 HE는 이빨과 손톱, 발톱으로 싸우는 법을 익히게 되었습니다. 또한 효율적으로 잔인한 방법으로 원주민을 사양하는 법 역시 습득할 수 있었습니다.

BehaviourResearch99.title: 행동 연구원
BehaviourResearch99.desc: 야생의 꼬맹이로 자랐던 NAME(은)는 어느 날 현대 사회의 사람들에게 체포되었습니다. HECAP는 빠르게 행동 연구원으로 적응했고 결국은 사설 시설을 소유할 수 있게 되었습니다. HECAP는 송곳니 전문가였지만 다른 모든 동물에 대한 많은 지식도 알고 있었습니다. 하지만 공교롭게도 식물엔 전혀 관심이 없었습니다.

RebelStudent39.title: 반군 학생
RebelStudent39.desc: NAME(은)는 특권있는 고위층 가정에서 자랐습니다. 하지만 늘 겸손했죠. 어린 시절엔 체스나 클레이 사격을 하며 자랐습니다. 다른 사람보다 우수한 학생으로써 HE는 행성이 가지는 실제 가치와 그들의 정부 정책과의 모순점에 대한 질문으로 선생님을 곤혹스럽게 하는데 재미를 찾았습니다.

PoliticalActivist61.title: 정치 활동가
PoliticalActivist61.desc: NAME(은)는 고향 행성 정부에 반대되는 진보적인 정치 당파에 관련이 있었습니다. 동료들로부터 받은 게릴라 전술 훈련은 전투에 숙련되게 만들었지만 자신의 신념을 타협하게 만들었습니다.

Cadet99.title: 생도
Cadet99.desc:
Born on the planet New China, NAME's father was a police chief and kept extremely strict watch over his son.
NAME had to do military-style drill exercises every day and keep his room spotlessly clean, always ready for inspection. HECAP came to abhor violence.

Flaneur73.title: 한량
Flaneur73.desc:
NAME strolled and sipped his way through the streets and cafes of HIS world, pursuing freedom at every turn, never becoming attached.
Through all this time, HE remained distrustful of others. And never took an order from anyone.

ShipTechnician62.title: 함선 전문가
ShipTechnician62.desc:
NAME was an apprentice technician on trade ships plying their routes between the stations and planets of her home system. In this job, she learned to fix and improve many machines.
Sometimes, her ship was assigned to short exploratory jaunts into dangerous regions of space.

ChiefEngineer74.title: 수석 기술자
ChiefEngineer74.desc:
As chief engineer on board a large spaceship, NAME was an expert in all things fiddly and complex.
She relied on other members of the crew for some of the basic necessities of life. She and her ship eventually disappeared into a longsleep voyage of exploration.

BlacksmithsSon72.title: 대장장이의 아들
BlacksmithsSon72.desc:
NAME's father owned the blacksmith shop in an run-down old city district. NAME would help his father whenever he could.
Later, HIS father took him as a blacksmith's apprentice and raised him as a man. NAME also to on shooting as a hobby.

BlacksmithShooter88.title: 대장장이 사수
BlacksmithShooter88.desc:
As a young blacksmith, NAME's family shop was raided by the police. HECAP shot two officers before they knocked him out and arrested him.
Sentenced to life in prison, NAME learned about traveling and raiding from other criminals.

JoywireAddict67.title: 쾌락회로 중독자
JoywireAddict67.desc:
NAME's wealthy parents provided everything HE ever wanted. After discovering joywires, HE became obsessed. Once HIS parents realized what happened, they cut HIM off.
Uncaring and often violent, HE sought his next joywire fix by any means possible.

AddictionCounsel61.title: 중독 상담사
AddictionCounsel61.desc:
After recovering from a joywire addiction, NAME adopted a non-violent way of life and vowed to help others.
Travelling between communities, HE used medicine, arts, and crafts to aid others who struggled with their own addictions.

ChildKnave65.title: 어린 악당
ChildKnave65.desc:
NAME was a child-knave of King Loteric. HECAP enjoyed the training with wooden sticks and engaging others in close combat. HECAP adapted quickly to the heat of battle and was good at spreading fire.
HECAP served his lord well, until the king died in an unfortunate accident.

BloodgameSurvivor96.title: 생존게임 생존자
BloodgameSurvivor96.desc:
NAME was sold to the Corestars Entertainment Company and used as meat in one of the company's system-wide broadcast shows.
HISCAP manipulative nature made HIM quite a nightmare, even to the audience. He was kicked out and exiled to a planet full of deadly animals, criminals and armed camera-drones.

WastelandWanderer2.title: 황무지 방랑자
WastelandWanderer2.desc:
Born into a wealthy family on a desert world, NAME was cast out after a hired attack squad destroyed his ancestral home.
The boy managed to hide in a cooling duct beneath his family's villa. Vowing revenge against the killers and whomever had hired them, Lucas struck out into the wasteland, alone.

VoidspaceRaider8.title: 진공의 침략자
VoidspaceRaider8.desc:
After years of seeking the assassin that broke up his family, NAME was offered a place with a group of space-faring raiders. He accepted, hoping to find the killer he sought.
Due to HIS seemingly-unending ability to narrowly escape danger, he earned the nickname 'Blackjack' in recognition of his luck.

PyroAssistant17.title: 방화광 조수
PyroAssistant17.desc:
On an industrial world, NAME learned early that if HE wanted to eat, HE had to work. So work HE did. Kids fit in places adults can't, and where HE was from, the safety laws were quite flexible.
HECAP was always a bit of a pyromaniac, and was banned from the kitchen after an unfortunate incident.

MachineFixer97.title: 기계 수리공
MachineFixer97.desc:
NAME was adept at dealing with mechanical problems, as long as the problem didn't involve the kitchen.
After a life spent around dangerous machinery and flammable chemicals, HE learned how to patch HIMself up pretty well. Despite the pain, HE never learned to dislike fire.

StreetUrchin39.title: 길바닥 부랑아
StreetUrchin39.desc:
After running away from home, NAME had to live on the streets.
She grew up fast, and learned early that she had to figure out how to fool people into connecting with her.

SpaceMerchant61.title: 우주 상인
SpaceMerchant61.desc: As part of a freelance interplanetary lifestyle, NAME sought to dominate her romantic interests as much as her business adversaries. When she didn't have her own ship to fly, she worked charter ships for hire.

ChildChemist73.title: 어린 약사
ChildChemist73.desc:
A midworld child, NAME was fixated on finding out exactly how everything worked.
HECAP collected rare objects and performed dangerous experiments on them. Delving deeper into these experiments, HE became isolated from the rest of the world. HECAP only left HIS research area to collect more materials.

BeastSlayer8.title: 짐승 학살자
BeastSlayer8.desc:
NAME traveled between planets, following news of animal attacks. HECAP would camp on the planet for weeks, learning about HIS prey before striking. HECAP most enjoyed hunting thrumbos.
Preferring to work alone, NAME enjoyed the thrill of the hunt, and the meat from the kill.

BrothelGofer60.title: 사창가 심부름꾼
BrothelGofer60.desc: Born on a steam-powered midworld wracked by a century of economic crises, NAME went to work at a young age. Scrounging, shoe-polishing, sewing - he did it all. But HE was most known as a brothel gofer, delivering all manner of aphrodisiacs and chemicals to the girls' rooms.

DrugLieutenant88.title: 마약 부관
DrugLieutenant88.desc:
NAME worked the drug trade under kingpin Grady Loughman. He had his men sell drugs when it was profitable, and fight the other cartels when the government came around.
His social skills kept him on top of the political game, and he always had servants to cook and clean.

LaborCampOrphan93.title: 노동수용소 고아
LaborCampOrphan93.desc: NAME lost her parents in an industrial accident and grew up in an orphans' labor camp. The camp overseers worked their charges mercilessly - but at least she was clothed and fed.

UrbworldEnforcer55.title: 도시계 집행자
UrbworldEnforcer55.desc:
NAME was an enforcer of law on an ancient urbworld.
She dealt with the worst of humanity, from protecting greedy urbworld nobility in their spire palaces to rooting out cannibal cults in the deepest reaches of the underground hive.

GameFanatic49.title: 게임 폐인
GameFanatic49.desc:
NAME was a fanatical gamer who learned to survive in virtual reality games.
Once, while attempting to prove HIS skills in the real world, HE was abducted by a criminal scientist and experimented on. HECAP escaped, but the experience stayed with him.

ToolMechanic40.title: 도구 정비공
ToolMechanic40.desc:
NAME was a famous tool mechanic on a dusty rim world.
After his firm closed due to scandal, HE joined a tribe to survive, crafting fine knives and hammers, traveling, and dealing HIS wares between settlements.

ClassClown20.title: 오락부장
ClassClown20.desc:
In the ultra-competitive environs of his glitterworld school, NAME always offered to play the class clown to diffuse tension.
HECAP developed a sense of social desperation from this, as well as an appreciation for the artistic side of comedy.

CraftShaper11.title: 공예 기술자
CraftShaper11.desc:
NAME locked HIMself in his studio for years, ordering delivery food to save time on cooking.
Eventually, HIS creations brought HIM the highest honor on Semantic World: Permission to materialize any design in minutes using the most advanced technologies.

CrimeBossChild12.title: 범죄 두목의 아이
CrimeBossChild12.desc:
NAME was adopted child of a notorious crime boss. HECAP was taught all facets of the family business, from smuggling to inventive ways of killing.
When the family was attacked, HIS father ordered HIM to hide in a secret longsleep crypt.

MercenaryLeader48.title: 용병 대장
MercenaryLeader48.desc:
Alone, NAME set out to rebuild HIS father's life's work. HECAP challenged the leader of a small band of mercenaries and took control, then led the band as they hijacked trade ships and stole valuable cargo.
HISCAP men mutinied. HECAP was abandoned, arrested, and sentenced to death.

SentimentalChild27.title: 감상적인 아이
SentimentalChild27.desc:
NAME was a nice child. When anybody had a problem, HE tried to fix it. But, being a child, HE did not always succeed. This hurt his sensitive soul.
HECAP dreamed of being a soldier who fights raiders and aliens.

SpecialForces72.title: 특수부대원
SpecialForces72.desc:
Give me a reason to kill - a good reason!
Markus was a soldier and a skilled one - so skilled that HE entered the special forces to battle militants and xenohuman raiders. HECAP never imagined himself a lone hero, but HE played HIS part in the group well.

DustyFarmHand63.title: 흙투성이 농부
DustyFarmHand63.desc:
From the time NAME could walk, HE helped take care of the animals and crops that HIS people tended in their arid homeland.
The work toughened HIM, but left little time for intellectual activities.

DromedaryKnight31.title: 낙타기병
DromedaryKnight31.desc:
Having caught the eye of HIS people's Sand King, NAME was trained in the Sandy Boomrat fighting technique.
Always with a camel to carry his things, HE served HIS sand people faithfully.

HackerKid65.title: 해커 꼬마
HackerKid65.desc:
Born on a high-tech world, NAME learned hack computers at a young age.
Spending many hours tinkering alone made HIM very good with machines, but very bad with humans.

BattleMechanic79.title: 전투 정비공
BattleMechanic79.desc:
NAME was a tech-obsessed mercenary in an early fusion-era system.
HECAP was unusually obsessed with gathering the right gear, and often customized HIS own equipment with original modifications.

VideoGamer94.title: 비디오 게이머
VideoGamer94.desc:
NAME grew up on a midworld, mostly locked in HIS room, playing video games. HECAP was warm-hearted, with a deep fondness for animals.
As HE grew up, HE turned to drugs to enhance his reality. During these trying times HE found passion and refuge in the gym.

DischargedSoldier81.title: 제대군인
DischargedSoldier81.desc:
Jeremy prostituted himself to fund his drug habits. As an escape, HE joined the military and learned to fight.
Too smart for the army, HE questioned and often disagreed with HIS superiors' decisions. This eventually led to HIS dishonorable discharge and left HIM with a chip on HIS shoulder.

Student1.title: 학생
Student1.desc:
NAME studied chemistry and quantum mechanics for entertainment.
HECAP was very good at convincing others to do his physical work, and made it a goal in life to avoid manual labor.

Chemist38.title: 약사
Chemist38.desc: NAME was a research chemist. HECAP worked with chemicals, from pharmaceuticals to explosives, to develop new substances and treatments.

SuperSoldier19.title: 슈퍼 군인
SuperSoldier19.desc:
NAME's government ran an experimental super-soldier development program. They kidnapped thousands of infants, conditioned their minds with drugs and machines, and trained them to fight.
Most infants died, but NAME did not. He killed his first man at age six, and was fighting in field operations not long after.

SuperSoldier81.title: 슈퍼 군인
SuperSoldier81.desc:
Product of a super-soldier program run by a now-deposed government, NAME was lost. HECAP survived the final suicide attack on the enemy mothership. What now?
For the first time in his life, HE had no orders, no objectives. HECAP rose from wreckage and strove towards uncertainty, towards freedom.

HeadjackAddict49.title: 헤드잭 중독자
HeadjackAddict49.desc: Plugged in to the computer via head-jack for days at a time, NAME found HE preferred the company of computers to that of people or pets.

CorporateBuilder80.title: 기업 건축업자
CorporateBuilder80.desc:
Even as HE stewed in HIS own wasted potential, NAME found HE had a knack for moving objects quickly. It was just what the planetary mega-corps wanted in their construction divisions.
Unfortunately, the monotonous work erased HIS remaining creative impulses.

UrbworldArmyBrat71.title: 도시계 군인 자녀
UrbworldArmyBrat71.desc:
NAME(은)는 도시계 군 기지에서 자랐습니다. 당시 NAME의 나이는 너무 어려 전투는 치를 수 없었지만, 다른 방향으로 유용해지는 법을 배웠습니다.
HE 총기나 군 장비에 익숙해졌지만 외부 세계를 접할 기회는 없었습니다.

MechanicsEngineer7.title: 기계 기술자
MechanicsEngineer7.desc:
NAME(은)는 문제 해결을 사랑합니다. 안정적이고 숙련된 솜씨로 평판을 얻은 후 NAME(은)는 기술자로 직업을 얻었습니다. HE 모든 크기와 종류의 다양한 장치들을 설계하고 디자인했습니다.
나중에 NAME(은)는 몇몇 기업을 고객으로 맞을 수 있었고, 그 연을 통해 여러 부유한 친구들을 만들었지만 강력한 적도 생기게 됐습니다.

PlagueChild8.title: 역병의사 조수
PlagueChild8.desc:
Born on a world wracked by plague, both of NAME's parents were doctors.
NAME was raised in reverse-quarantine, under the Hippocratic oath. HECAP experienced little social interaction. However, HE gained a lot of medical experience assisting in treatments.

PlagueDoctor99.title: 역병의사
PlagueDoctor99.desc:
NAME(은)는 히포크라테스 선서에 따르며 전염병으로 파괴된 여러 행성들의 의료지원을 맡았습니다. HE 격리조치된 환자들에게 복잡한 약물을 처방해 상태를 호전시키며 신약을 개발했습니다.
NAME(은)는 업무 외의 일상이 아예 없었습니다.

YoungMaster70.title: 어린 군주
YoungMaster70.desc:
두 명의 의무병 사이에서 태어난 NAME의 권력에 대한 갈망은 대단했습니다. HIS 날카로운 지적 능력과 카리스마는 주위 사람들의 존경을 받기에 충분했습니다.
권력의 사다리를 오르는 가장 좋은 방법은 입대하는 것이라고 생각한 NAME(은)는 최대한 어린 나이로 제국군에 자원했습니다.

ImperialGeneral31.title: 제국군 장군
ImperialGeneral31.desc:
힘에 대한 NAME의 갈망이 HIM 만들었습니다. HE 군에서 높은 자리까지 빠르게 진급했고 곧 장군의 지위를 얻었습니다.
HE 탐험가의 발도 닿지 않을 정도로 외진 변방계들을 정복하는 힘든 임무를 받았습니다. 성공적인 완수는 HIM 황제의 후계자로 올려놓을 수 있을 정도였습니다.

CaravanTraveler5.title: 행상 여행자
CaravanTraveler5.desc: 행상가문의 아들로 태어난 NAME(은)는 HIS 아버지에게서 상인이 되는 법을 교육받았습니다. HE 짐 나르는 동물들을 보살피는 일을 주로 맡았고, 떠도는 생활로 인해 음식은 주로 사냥과 수집을 통해 구해야 했습니다.

Caravaneer77.title: 행상 지도자
Caravaneer77.desc:
NAME(은)는 행상의 지도자였습니다. HE 상단의 안전을 책임졌고 수많은 거래에서 협상을 맡았습니다.
HE와 HIS 사람들은 풍요를 누릴 수 있었지만 부는 강도들을 유혹했습니다. 따라서 상단원들은 전원 무장하고 싸워서 적을 쫓아내야 했습니다.

FarmersSon51.title: 농부의 아들
FarmersSon51.desc:
Ade spent much of his childhood learning biome farming. In his biome they kept animals to investigate which would cope best in the alien environment.
Due to this, the travel restrictions and oxygen rationing system, he rarely got to meet anyone from outside his family.

RebelFighter79.title: 반군 전투원
RebelFighter79.desc:
When civil war broke out Ade remained neutral to either side, until his biome was firebombed by a loyalist militia.
Later, his unit gave him the nickname "Rare" after he burnt down the luxury villa of a loyalist leader, with them still inside it.

WealthyStudent21.title: 부유한 학생
WealthyStudent21.desc:
NAME was born on a wealthy glitterworld. HECAP studied at the Caspian school of Engineering, and excelled in mathematics and computer programming.
NAME grew up in clean, sterile environments. HECAP never saw a farm or livestock.

Roboticist20.title: 로봇 기술자
Roboticist20.desc:
NAME felt more comfortable with robots and artificial intelligences than with organic people, so HE worked as a roboticist. HECAP took a particular interest in mechanites and ancient technology.
NAME relied on other people for HIS basic needs.

StreetPeddler62.title: 거리의 행상인
StreetPeddler62.desc:
Growing up on an industrial midworld where robberies and muggings weren't uncommon, NAME helped support his family by making small trinkets and novelties to sell to passers-by.
HECAP learned early on that it wasn't always what HE knew, but who HE knew that would get HIM far in life.

PrivateDetective57.title: 사립탐정
PrivateDetective57.desc: As a private eye, sharp wits and a silver tongue were NAME's greatest tools. HECAP often spent HIS nights working cases that ranged from uncovering affairs and learning trade secrets to solving murder cases and infiltrating criminal organizations. There wasn't a case HE wouldn't accept for the right price.

BodyguardTrainee27.title: 경호원 수련생
BodyguardTrainee27.desc:
NAME was born into a famously skilled family of bodyguards. HISCAP mothers Elena and Victoria forced HIM into many dangerous situations, training HIM to put HIS client's well-being over HIS own.
NAME was taught about many herbs and natural poisons to help HIM prevent clients from being poisoned.

SpaceBartender52.title: 우주 바텐더
SpaceBartender52.desc:
NAME became a bartender on a space station. HECAP interacted with and befriended many strangers.
As time went on, NAME used HIS knowledge of herbs to craft HIS own strange concoctions for HIS customers.

SpoiledChild65.title: 응석받이
SpoiledChild65.desc:
NAME was the child of an industrious space engineer. HISCAP parents forbade most manual and dangerous tasks, so HE learned art and music instead.
HECAP loved animals, but HIS parents never let HIM have a pet - though HE played with other people's pets a lot.

CosmeticSurgeon52.title: 성형외과 의사
CosmeticSurgeon52.desc:
NAME had a terrible bedside manner due to HIS abrasiveness. HECAP often bullied HIS patients into getting cosmetic surgery. HECAP made a lot of money this way.
While very studious and careful in HIS work, HE never had to lift a finger doing domestic chores.

Philosopher26.title: 철학자
Philosopher26.desc:
NAME was a student on a glitterworld. HECAP had a hard time in school, since the other kids thought HIM rather strange.
HECAP always maintained a distance from these events, being continuously surprised by the many interesting and awkward ways life can go.

UprightDiplomat83.title: 올곧은 외교관
UprightDiplomat83.desc:
As a diplomat, NAME was assigned to deal with diplomatic tasks in the blood-soaked outer rim sectors.
HECAP hoped to end the endless wars, until HIS consularship, the St. Anthem, was attacked by a raider fleet.

CaveChild67.title: 동굴의 아이
CaveChild67.desc:
NAME grew up in a cave on an tundra planet, and was adopted by a traveling group of entertainers known only as the Wizards. Once a starfaring crew, the Wizards told HIM wondrous stories about the universe.
One day, the Wizards did not return from scavenging. After years of waiting, NAME set off into space to find them.

VideoProducer97.title: 비디오 프로듀서
VideoProducer97.desc:
Too awkward to socialize, NAME found comfort in the production of videos. Oddly, people enjoyed his videos, calling them "perfect sitcom dramas".
NAME took advantage of this and broadcast more, ever hopeful that HE would be contacted by the Wizards.

RangerChild91.title: 레인저 자녀
RangerChild91.desc:
NAME was raised in a forest. HISCAP father taught HIM to hunt and live off the land, so that HE could live without the need of others when father died.
Accustomed to manual labor and with an intuitive mind, NAME could survive weeks alone.

BushSniper97.title: 숲의 저격수
BushSniper97.desc:
NAME's peaceful life was cut short when HIS country was brutally invaded.
NAME was drafted into service as soon as HE was of legal age, and quickly showed an aptitude for rifles. HECAP spent months living in the forests picking off soldiers who dared cross the border.

GlitterworldRoyal5.title: 번화계 귀족
GlitterworldRoyal5.desc:
NAME grew up in a glitterworld royal household. She was groomed from a young age to marry into another planet's royal family.
Unfortunately, her crooked teeth made her undesirable to suitors, so she became bitter and resentful.

PirateSympathizer24.title: 해적 옹호자
PirateSympathizer24.desc:
From her youth, NAME developed connections in the underworld. There she trained in melee combat and became a trusted underworld advisor.
After participating in a failed rebellion, she fled her homeworld to travel with a pirate band.

PlagueSurvivor48.title: 역병 생존자
PlagueSurvivor48.desc:
NAME watched as a mysterious plague spread through his town, killing his family and friends.
HECAP learned some medicine from watching the plague doctors, but was mentally scarred by the ordeal.

UnethicalDoctor97.title: 비윤리적인 의사
UnethicalDoctor97.desc:
NAME became a doctor to save lives and research medicine. HECAP soon realized the only way to make progress on HIS research was to perform experiments on human patients.
HECAP often used patients for HIS experiments - whether they were willing or not.

OffworldRecruit22.title: 외우주 훈련병
OffworldRecruit22.desc:
NAME was born an raised in an offworld soldier growth facility. From a very young age, HE was taught close-quarters combat tactics, aggression, and how to survive on distant planets.
One of the best, NAME was eventually chose to enter the orbital-deployment shock troop corps.

ShockTrooper52.title: 쇼크트루퍼
ShockTrooper52.desc:
NAME was in a deep space shock troop unit deployed on multiple planets in various wars.
During a risky assault, HIS whole unit was wiped out. Nobody else knew what happened on the field that day, but NAME will carry the burden forever.

ProdigalStudent39.title: 낭비하는 학생
ProdigalStudent39.desc:
NAME was a faithful student, and was dedicated to learning anything and everything he could about humanity and its creations.
While HE was shunned as a nerd, HE didn't mind. HECAP hoped for a brighter future.

CombatMedtech40.title: 전투 의무기술병
CombatMedtech40.desc:
As a military medtech, NAME's job was to fix and build anything he could get HIS hands on, from living people to machines and mechs.
Sent into dangerous areas, HE never had a problem saving soldiers' lives and building the technology and machines needed to win.

AdventurousYouth32.title: 모험적인 어린이
AdventurousYouth32.desc:
NAME explored all around HIS family's large estate, uncovering little natural wonders hidden in nearby catacombs, rivers, and caves.
During his teenage years, NAME made numerous enemies

TreasureHunter70.title: 보물 사냥꾼
TreasureHunter70.desc:
NAME explored outer rim planets in hopes of finding rare treasures.
After succeeding in finding one legendary sculpture, HE was betrayed by HIS men. HECAP survived their treasonous attack, but the sculpture was taken.
HECAP created the Anvil Mercenary Company to help HIM seek revenge.

PilotFan99.title: 조종사 팬
PilotFan99.desc:
NAME's father was a starfighter pilot, and HE always idolized the old man.
From a young age, HE collected pilot memorabilia and studied pilot books, preparing to join the deep space navy and follow in HIS father's footsteps.

StarfighterPilot54.title: 스타파이터 조종사
StarfighterPilot54.desc:
After years of training and drilling, NAME finally became a starfighter pilot.
Hundreds of combat missions later, HE grew bored and started seeking newer thrills. HECAP joined a band of space pirates, which eagerly welcomed HIM because of HIS piloting skill.

MedicalHelper65.title: 간호조무사
MedicalHelper65.desc:
NAME traveled between rim worlds with HIS family. NAME's mother, a renowned doctor, often delivered lectures from the hull of their retrofitted cargo/medical ship.
Sometimes, the family took on difficult long-term medical work with especially needy patients, and NAME helped where he could.

GangSoldier28.title: 갱 전투원
GangSoldier28.desc:
Living for many years between three raider settlements, NAME persevered through many challenges: a spacecraft implosion, cryptostasis, crashlanding on a miserable dustball of a planet, and nursing an old man back to health, and many of battles.
HECAP eventually took control of a violent gang.

CountryChild62.title: 시골 어린이
CountryChild62.desc: NAME was raised up to fear God and love HIS country. HECAP was a genuine backwoods kid. HECAP always worked hard to earn respect rather than demanding it.

SpaceMarine80.title: 우주 해병
SpaceMarine80.desc:
NAME joined Interplanetary Marines to travel the stars fight for HIS planet. HECAP distinguished himself in several battles.
HISCAP experiences desensitized him to people around him, and his social skills degraded. But, he did learn how to fight.

RebelWriter82.title: 반군 작가
RebelWriter82.desc: Early on, NAME developed a talent for writing. HECAP was soon writing a popular online journal - anonymously, to hide HIS age - on topics ranging from bioethics to political theory and xenosociology.

Adventurer17.title: 모험가
Adventurer17.desc:
NAME's thirst for adventure took HIM to many planets. HECAP visited the brightest glitterworlds and the darkest war-torn toxic planets in HIS quest to find novelty and excitement.
HECAP worked as little as possible, often skirting ethical boundaries to make a quick buck. Among all jobs, HE hated cooking the most.

ExiledPrince89.title: 추방당한 왕자
ExiledPrince89.desc:
A member of a royal family, NAME was exiled for shaming HIS family.
Living in a foreign land, mostly alone, HE spent most of HIS time making huts and houses to live in. HECAP found little time in an average day for enjoyment, and lost all his friends and family.

BloodyWanderer51.title: 피에 물든 방랑자
BloodyWanderer51.desc:
NAME was a wanderer, traveling from town to town, taking odd jobs and stealing to live.
One day, he had a mental break and went on a long rampage, destroying several towns and killing many. HECAP eventually calmed, but HIS bloodlust never left HIM.

NewAgeDuelist36.title: 뉴에이지 격투가
NewAgeDuelist36.desc:
NAME was fascinated with combat. HIS parents traveled often, so HE was able to sample many different fighting styles, from 76th-wave jujutsu to the infamous 'urbworld-style' karate.
A polite child, most fighters accepted HIS requests for training - but moving around often without finishing a tutelage made HIM lazy.

PirateDoctor33.title: 해적 의사
PirateDoctor33.desc:
NAME had a passion for medicine, but never bothered to get a medical degree. Only underfunded pirates and terrorists were desperate enough to hire HIS services, and HIS surgical patients had about a 50% survival rate.
Despite this, HIS optimistic attitude drove HIM to keep trying to heal those in need. As long as they paid up front.

SpoiledBrat84.title: 버릇없는 응석받이
SpoiledBrat84.desc:
Born in a rich family, NAME was given everything, and never developed basic work ethic or the foundations of a non-dependent personality.
HECAP was expected to become one of the best doctors in the world.

BloodyDentist33.title: 피에 물든 치과의사
BloodyDentist33.desc:
After studying at a famous college, NAME's weak personality eventually snapped under the strain of angry administrators and whining patients. HECAP went on a secret murder spree, killing many of those under HIS care.
After a pursuit, HE managed to escape HIS planet and travel to a new world.

CowFarmer93.title: 소 사육인
CowFarmer93.desc:
NAME grew up on a rim world, under the tyranny of HIS father, who forced HIM to work every day on the farm. HE dreamed of escaping HIS father and exploring the universe.
One day, when the trade ship was overhead, HE stowed away among the goods in the launch pods, and escaped into space.

MasterChef6.title: 헤드셰프
MasterChef6.desc:
On a glitterworld, NAME found a job washing dishes at a famous restaurant and worked HIS way up the ranks.
A few years later, HIS career came to an end when someone poisoned the meal HE was preparing for the mayor. Jobless, HE and left to explore the stars once again.

DiscardedYouth95.title: 버려진 아이
DiscardedYouth95.desc:
NAME grew up isolated on a trash planet. A dumping ground for surrounding glitterworlds, it was a harsh home. As a baby, HE sucked on the tap of a discarded nutrient paste dispenser for comfort.
In these desperate circumstances, against all odds, HE survived - and thrived.

Mercenary19.title: 용병
Mercenary19.desc:
After escaping his home planet, NAME fell in with a band of mercenaries. HECAP fought alongside his brothers and sisters in arms for many years.
One day, they were caught in a fight they couldn't win. Refusing to retreat, NAME was shot down by his enemies. HECAP was alarmed to awake in a heap of corpses, mysteriously unharmed.

DisasterSurvivor28.title: 재앙 생존자
DisasterSurvivor28.desc: NAME's planet collided with a small moon. Everything he knew as home was destroyed, and his entire family died. HECAP was left in the ruins to fend for himself.

ExplorerWriter37.title: 탐험작가
ExplorerWriter37.desc:
NAME traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research.
HISCAP goal was to bring together enough knowledge to make a survival guide for future generations.

RebelChild7.title: 반군 자녀
RebelChild7.desc:
NAME was born under authoritarian rule. Despite intense oppression from family and community, she never gave up fighting for her dignity and her freedom.
She was often put into hopeless situations where even family would try to terrorize her into propriety. She learned to trust no one.

MilitiaSoldier83.title: 민병대원
MilitiaSoldier83.desc:
NAME joined the militia forces and fought for rights and peace.
After her homeworld was unexpectedly destroyed in the wars, she traveled great distances, seeking a refuge where she could build a new, free way of life.

MidworldCadet20.title: 중간계 사관후보생
MidworldCadet20.desc:
Growing up on a high-tech midworld with a flourishing space transit industry, NAME wished to leave for the stars and live among the growing spacer class.
HECAP excelled in HIS studies, and gained entry to HIS homeworld's most prestigious naval academy.

WarshipCaptain77.title: 전투함 선장
WarshipCaptain77.desc:
Years of being commanding officer of an advanced corvette taught NAME the art of leadership, the techniques of higher engineering, and how to stay calm while enemies try to kill you.
Unfortunately, NAME only very rarely had contact with nature.

Punk70.title: 불량배
Punk70.desc: NAME(은)는 고등학생들에게 싸구려 담배를 팔며 유년기를 보냈습니다. 보통 잘라낸 잡초로 만들었습니다.

GameDeveloper59.title: 게임 개발자
GameDeveloper59.desc:
NAME(은)는 독립게임 개발자였습니다.
이른 성공 후에, HIS 커리어는 잘못된 아이디어, 지켜지지 않은 약속, 그로 인한 절박한 광고 시도로 인해 완전히 추락했습니다.
